title: X
description:
Welcome to X, your trusted digital town square, where conversations unfold in real time, and the world connects through breaking news, live events, podcasts, and everything in between. Whether you're passionate about sports, tech, music, or politics, X is your front-row seat to what‚Äôs happening across the globe.

X isn‚Äôt just another social media app, it‚Äôs the ultimate destination for staying well informed, sharing ideas, and building communities. With X, you‚Äôre always in the loop with relevant trending topics and breaking news, delivered instantly to your screen, raw and unfiltered.

What You Can Do on X:
‚Ä¢ Follow breaking news from around the world before it hits the headlines, and stay ahead of the curve with real-time updates on trending topics and viral conversations.

‚Ä¢ Post your thoughts, photos, and videos with a global community. Join millions of users in shaping public dialogue across social, cultural, and political conversations.

‚Ä¢ Discover Grok, the AI assistant powered by X‚Äôs real-time data. You can ask Grok to summarize trending news, explain videos, or give you more context about posts.

‚Ä¢ Stream live video or go live with Spaces, our audio feature that enables you to host discussions, hold interviews, or start your next live podcast. Whether you're streaming a concert, a live game, or your thoughts on a hot topic, X keeps your audience engaged.

‚Ä¢ Watch videos: from live breaking news and sports clips to podcasts and gaming sessions that last up to 3 hours long. Many of the world‚Äôs leading voices, in comedy, gaming, podcasting, and politics, all share their content on X.

‚Ä¢ Connect and chat privately with friends, followers, customers, or collaborators through Direct Messages.

‚Ä¢ Join and build communities tailored to your interests: from sports news, gaming, entertainment, crypto, entrepreneurship, tech, and more.

‚Ä¢ Subscribe to X Premium to unlock exclusive features like a blue checkmark, boosted visibility, prioritized replies, fewer ads, longer videos, and post editing. X Premium also gives you access to creator revenue sharing and the ability to offer exclusive content to subscribers.

Why X?
In a world of constant change, X is your real-time source to stay ahead of the curve, connect with people, and explore diverse perspectives. From breaking live news and trending memes to top podcasts and live streams from your favorite creators, X brings it all together in one powerful social experience.

scraped_reviews.content: This app, as well as the website on PC, is so unbearably slow that it has frozen my phone and dragged my PC's speed to an absolute crawl just by being open. I've done everything from clearing the cache on phone and PC, to uninstalling & reinstalling (or shutting off my PC), to fix the issue; and nothing fixes the issue, but the fact that it's happening to multiple people everywhere on multiple devices already shows the issue is not on my end.

if I have to verify that "yes I am a person" one more time I'm going to go insane every other comment I post I get redirected to a "confirm you're a person" page, it's ridiculous... the "graphic content" warning as a "show" option, but it doesn't work half the time so the image stays hidden and there's nothing I can do about it even when I have that setting disabled...

Recent update now prevents me from uploading images through the app. Trying to upload anything tells me I have the permissions to access my Media and Files turned off, and that I need to enable them. But the permissions don't have Media and Files, or anything similar, listed to allow/deny. I swear, with this app, it's always one thing or another.

Used to be my favorite social media app before it went downhill. After the rebrand to X, it's been accruing more and more glitches/bugs, bots/spam, and other issues. It has a plethora of confusing differences from the website, which makes it seem as though the app has been neglected. At this point, it's easier to delete the app and use the website on my browser. Truly disappointing.

After sometime away, I went to get on. I am a person that loves to see strange and twisted looks of art and adult content. So what I can't even press the button to see these things, I have to go brought the extra steps of seeing these on PC/Laptop. It's annoying and would rather this be fixed along with the lag, immediately than whatever else is being fixed.

Don't want to give even 1 star. I'm a premium user. It's been over a week since X on S25U has been lagging. (But it works on other mobiles, and just this app has probs.) Can't like, reply, post, DM, and not load videos and messages at random times (mostly almost 24 hrs a day. The sync issue always occurs. I reinstalled the app and it never works. Don't ask for Helpdesk because you'll never get any help, and you don't even know how to reach them. It gets worse every single day.

I haven't gotten any notifications on either WiFi or my data for the past 3-4 days. My settings in and out of the app are configured to allow for them to come through, and still nothing. Please fix this, I'm just trying to keep in touch with friends. Edit 8/2/2023: This was never fixed. I'm logged into multiple accounts and get spotty notifications for a random one each day. This app is borderline unusable now.

Absolute trash of an app. Been trying for over an hour to login, just error error error. My details are right, it just won't accept them. I logged in and out of the browser version perfectly fine, so I know my login details are correct, the app just doesn't want to accept them. I've given up trying, it is utterly useless, I would give negative stars if it were possible.

I like Twitter (I refuse to call it X). It's where I go to get the real news, or at least try to. The app has become really buggy to the point that it is becoming frustrating to use. I now seem to be forever opening & closing it to try to get it to work. There are far too many ads, but most annoyingly constant playback errors on videos, or they suddenly stop playing halfway through. Tweets can take ages to load, and for some reason, the app is totally unusable if I'm charging my Android phone.

Almost every single day, at some point, nothing will load. Can't load my main feed, or anyone's profile. No videos or photos will load. It mostly happens in the afternoons or evenings. Twitter devs please fix this app. Or fix the servers. It's not normal for an app to go down for 30-60 minutes every day. That just bad business.

This app is full of issues! It won't play videos when I press play sometimes, and when I leave the app and come back after some time, I get a "Cannot retrieve messages at this time" error message. Ever since Twitter rebranded as "x", it has gone downhill quality-wise. I barely experienced any issues or bugs when it was still Twitter. This app is becoming unbearable at this point.

Multiple issues that a multibillion dollar company should never have. App sometimes won't load for hours on end, regardless of internet connection. Scrolling through videos will consistently play the audio of different videos over eachother. Videos will randomly pause, sometimes as often as every 15 seconds. Platform is overrun with AI bots and spam accounts. Update: Months later and this is still an issue with zero effort to fix.

I have an account that I can't access. When I enter my email address it doesn't register it even though I have notices from Twitter that go to the email that the app claims is not correct. This is aggravating especially when I try to use my phone number it doesn't work either and I end up locked out of an account that Twitter can't confirm.

Unusable now. Doesn't show content you follow in a way that makes sense and often doesn't show new posts. Getting all kinds of adds I don't care about. Keeps switching me from follow to discover tab, but seems to be intentionally set up so it shows about 80% stuff I do follow so I don't notice until I run into a bunch I don't. Block system useless. It no longer hides your content. It just won't let blocked accounts message you. And there are so many bots. Seeing lots of hacked accounts recently

Initially gave this a 4 star. But in recent months, it's been plagued with weird bugs and issues. And I just learned yesterday that it only functioned properly under VPN. So, is this a regional issue then? Can't really tell. But until there's confirmation to that, I have no choice but to lower the rating due to its inconvenience to use. üòî (UPDATE NOV 24) Still crashing daily. Score lowered and uninstalled. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Honestly it's SOOOO buggy some days that it makes it not even worth it to use the app. Notoriously when you load the app, you get the spinning white wheel that seemingly never disappears, while no pages refresh, no videos or pictures load, and no amount of closing out the app and clearing out ones cache fixes the issue. Other apps load so it's not an internet or "user error".

Everyday multiple times a day the app just stops working and won't load anything. It's VERY annoying. Sometimes it can be long periods of time before I can get new content. Closing the app, clearing cache, and unistalling then reinstalling do nothing to alleviate the issue. It just starts working again. This issue has been going on for a while with multiple users complaining. Can't understand why it's not fixed yet

With the introduction of four different levels of upgrades, they have added them quite nicely to the top of each screen so that you know you always have the option to upgrade. But something as simple as logging out of one's account you need to Google to figure out on an Android how to get to the option. It should not be difficult. As a programmer I learned in 1980 that the user interface is the most important aspect. It defines the success of your application. Don't hide things.

App has been ruined by bots and my feed being filled with content I have no interest in, so I have to keep blocking people to get rid of it. Now there's an issue where images won't load for me until I restart the app multiple times! Didn't have any problems until it changed ownership! Update as of 9/21: App is even more unstable. Loads nothing 80% of the time. Just Awful.

I'm experiencing significant issues with Direct Message (DM) notifications on X. Sometimes I receive them promptly, but other times I miss messages entirely, even when the app is open and notifications are enabled. This is incredibly frustrating, especially when I'm engaged in conversations and expect to receive timely responses. This unreliable notification system hinders effective communication and makes it difficult to maintain conversations. I urge the X team to prioritize fixing this issue.

Works well, mostly. Areas for improvement: -advancing or backing up in videos. I mess it up. Please make easier somehow. -posts fail without telling me. I find them in drafts later. No explanation. -I accidentally heart a livestream while trying to adjust something. -I accidentally leave a livestream while trying to adjust something, look at comments, or something.

The app was getting worse and worse since Musk took over (autoplaying videos of accidents and shootings), most accounts I'm shown I don't even follow... Rarely use it now, but it doesn't even work anymore as I can't even log in. I get stuck in a loop trying to log in, put my code in, and then it goes back to the beginning...

Can work okay for stretches. App does not work when phone plugged in. Will occasionally stop refreshing. Can't turn off auto scroll on videos, jumping to a loud temu add. Audio from the "for you" tab continues to play in the "following" tab and vice versa. Lot of adult bots and spam, especially if the adult variety

I've spent years training the algorithm to my personal preferences, so the app works well for me. I don't get even near the level of hate speech and misinformation that many claim to get on this app. That said, I think X could do a better job limiting the reach of misinformation and differentiating serious posts and accounts from sarcastic ones or parodies.

The app likes to refresh your feed whenever you open it which on paper sounds like a good idea I'm sure. However in my experience your feed will have a cool picture or an interesting post you want to read and then POOF it's gone forever unless you get lucky and find it again after over a minute of scrolling. This happens every time I open the app and often it'll do it twice, so you get the experience of seeing something you like and then having it yeeted twice !

This is a review of X's AI Grok. It would be my favourite AI except for the fact that u can't save your history. The positives include unlimited questions without payment. You can ask for current X user sentiments on various issues. It's also got amazing recall for thoughts brought up at every point in a conversation and the ability to tie everything in. But once you exit the app the conversation is gone. I tend to copy and paste the answers for later use, but a history would be very beneficial

Without even going into what Elon has done to the algorithm, this app is now awful from a functionality point of view. New tweets don't load, so when I scroll I see the same tweets repeatedly. My screen automatically jumps up to ads which all autoplay. This combined with the garbage tweets your forced to see from the blueticks makes the app no longer worth using.

I do 99% of my tweeting on mobile so I really rely on the app. I think the new design looks great, mostly. But my issue is when I go to peoples pages, I can't see all (or any) of their new tweets. And I have to go on Twitter on the browser to see them. Very frustrating.

I use it daily, find it very useful. Somewhat surprised about large number of negative comments here from other users, this has not been my experience at all. Having said that, I did have to set up some 'excluded words' filters in order to automatically remove tons of annoying spammy comments (actually I am surprised it is not done at the app level). As it is there is simply no equivalent app where different topics can be tracked in one place.

Repost filter doesn't work, app literally unusable. I open the app and all I see is spammed reposts from accounts I specifically selected the "turn off reposts" option. Still there. The app is literally unusable now, since I cant see what I actually want to. Ontop of that, submitting a bug report, or any kind of support at all, is locked behind a paywall. I shouldn't have to look for literal loopholes, or modding an app or API, just to make the app work how its supposed to. What a joke.

Can't play videos. Always saying "Playback error" even though I have refreshed the app many times... I can't even watch videos in here anymore. What's the point of reposting when I don't know what the video is anymore. I've been experiencing this issue since last year but I still gave Twitter a chance. Nope. I can't keep turning blind eye on this. I can no longer enjoy this app at all. Switching to a better app.

the new DM's/Chats are TERRIBLE. I dont know why anyone thought it was a good idea to change them, but as someone who mainly uses twitter/ "X" to talk to people, this update is the worst thing this app has ever done. I get 2 notifications per message, my messages tab is useless now, i cant share posts easily, cant use voice memos, and also cant share all of my images as easily. "X" is becoming less and less usable every single day.

Android version is the worst. In the apple version you can choose the quality of the videos but that's not the case for android and in comparison to desktop version there is no grid layout previews in the media tab. Finally when you play videos with attached ads and try to use navigate bar of videos it no longer exists instead when you touch the video the ad plays.

What is the point? The app closes when writing in it and doesn't save drafts so you lose evwrything. That, the tweepcred manipulation by large accounts blocking smalls, the general garbage algo that doesn't even show you to your followers, and the total lack of responsiblity of the devs. . . this app is pointless to maintain on my phone. It is no longer fun to use.

It's the fastest source for information and current events as well as gathering people with knowledge on various subjects. The caveat is that it feels like a lot of raw information you'll have to sort through and verify. But further integration with Grok as well as other continual improvements seem to making the overall experience better. For example, X has now has the function that allows Grok to break down and explain a post simply by pressing the icon. I'd say more but there's a word limit.

v11.28.0 is disastrous. It has cut the permission to access the image storage. Impossible to post images. Grok says that it's the version's 'bug'. It's too big to name it 'a bug' or 'a glitch'. Many user reports from the users of old Android app, but some from the users of new Android versions. Seems the the team will be fixing it, but no comments in X's accounts. Seems they are keeping it secret. The users can't change App Permission in Setting. We can't but wait for the fixed version. Awful.

The best social media platform, with minimal censorship and niches for whatever you are interested in. The app isn't perfect by any means, but usually works well. The biggest issue I have is with bookmark custom folders. For some reason, I can only see the most recent ~200 bookmarks in a folder on mobile, after that many it refuses to load anymore. If I want to see older bookmarks. I MUST use the default unorganized folder, which defeats the purpose! This doesn't happen on a desktop browser, tho

My account got suspended and permanently read-only mode, just because I accidentally posted 1 or 2 duplicate posts by mistake, when my pc was lagging and I didn't know. Furthermore, I had at least submitted 3 to 4 appeal to get my account back, but not one person responding to my appeals, and I can't get help, this is frustrating tbh. Moreover, I can't make a new account becuz of restrictions so that annoying, I most use X for news and videos guides for gaming, now I can't even do anything.

Ever since Elon took over, it's gone downhill with every update. Several times a day, the app will just crash and I get a pop-up message saying "Cannot retrieve posts/messages at this time." Hey Elon, FIX THIS APP!!!! Update 11/12/25: just updated and I'm now seeing a pop-up that says "Cannot retrieve posts" on MY OWN ACCOUNT and I KNOW I'm not suspended

As of this moment, I am unable to post Photos or Videos. It seems to be a bug, considering the permission options for media has vanished entirely after updating. it seems I am not the only one, as at least one other user is complaining about it. And rightfully so. That said, I am happy to see that the app itself is more storage friendly with its file size. I'm not sure if this is connected with the bug, so I thought I just mention it. I am asking to kindly fix this issue.

Desperately trying to avoid / mute all the clickbait, ads and attention-seeking nonsense from large accounts. This seems to be intentionally made harder and harder. A huge part of the content in my feed(s) is not what I opened the app for. Showing this 'For you' tab by default on app launch is the latest disappointment in this category. also: what I follow: certain specific normal subject. what I see in timeline: human torture, animal cruelty, a lot more I don't ever liked.

App keeps getting worse with each update. And if a post has a spoiler warning on it, hitting the "show" button doesn't work. Hasn't worked in over 4 months.. Even though I have my age set, and have the "show sensitive content" on in my settings. This app is terrible. Also full of racist, horrible, people. If I could rate this app 0 stars, I would, in a heartbeat.

I can't search previous year post on advanced search despite being correct. same as before, This is by far one of the worst social media app i ever used and ever seen, it's full of toxic and braindead people, I've been experiencing it multiple times already, the discussion in this one is absolutely horrendous, i reported a few tweet from people because it's offensive and yet they ignore it. Fix the issue immediately.

It randomly stopped requesting permission to media and file storage I can't post pictures. I've looked through the various places on my phone where you can give access to allow it to do that and it doesn't show anywhere like the app itself isn't asking to have those permissions and there is no option to allow it. I've troubleshooted clear catch, uninstall, restart, look at app management, go to special permissions, ect nothing, even in the list of all apps that can access media x isn't there.

Every time I try to login to the app, I get access denied "attestation error". I know for sure my details are correct. An absolute shambolic, amateurish organisation. Clueless. It's like a shop locking out its customers. Amazed any advertisers still use it.

I've had my account forever, years, never any problems until now... when i click on my app, it goes straight to a notification saying i need to pass as a human and to click the recaptcha box, and i do but it keeps restarting asking for the same thing, over and over, can't contact Twitter because there's no option for this problem, no way to contact Twitter, they stated i got an email but i didn't and yes i looked in spam-nothing!

You click a video watch it, scroll back to the listings or current news to click something else and the last video you were watching continues to play even if you click a new post relating to something else, so now you have two videos playing which is ridiculous. you then have to either close the app of click back to the original video and try to stop it. Sometimes it stops/paused but the second you back away from it the video starts again. ((((Posted back in September 2025, it's still broken)))

X is the best platform in the world, and allows you to be the new media, world-wide. Given my experience on X, this is the only place to get the real news from around the world, the best AI engine to create content, photos, videos, and interactive search engine and the best way to meet new friends. out of all the apps available, X is the only one worth using for news, connections, social interactions, and allows you to be the media and listened to by the world.

Not able to comment using pics after the latest update. It Ask for permission to access gallery, if given limited access, then it does nothing, like even if I click the photo to comment, nothing happens. Please fix it. Gif comments are working fine. For the love of God, pls release an update. Not ABLE TO POST PHOTOS, not able to post photos in comments, PLS FIX IT.

I normally love this app, but ever since the newest update with direct messages happened, my messages are messed up, the full update probably hasn't even kicked in yet for me! and message notifications pop up twice. direct messages need to go back to the way they were!

title: Pandora - Music & Podcasts
description:
Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes. 

Create stations from your favorite songs, artists or genres, search or browse to find recommended stations for your mood or activity, and discover podcasts that speak to you. Download today and get instant access to your favorite artists and podcasts, while staying up to date on the most recent singles and releases. From rap and pop to rock and country, play your favorite artists and stay up to date on today‚Äôs top hits and releases. Start streaming all of the current global hits and enjoy your own personalized music experience. 

Take Pandora with you wherever you go with Android Auto for your daily commute or your next road trip. Enjoy your own personalized music or podcast experience from anywhere on the world‚Äôs most powerful music discovery platform. The new voice mode lets you search, play, pause, skip adjust volume & thumb up music with a simple voice command. Start streaming your favorite artist, song, genre, or podcast instantly today for free in your car.

Take your favorite stations with you‚Äîright from your wrist using Wear OS. Perfect for workouts, walks, or when you‚Äôre traveling light. No phone? No problem. Stream music directly over Wi-Fi or cellular.

With Podcasts on Pandora, find your favorites and listen to personalized recommendations that actually make sense. Just search on your mobile phone or tablet and play to start listening, then tap + to add to your collection. Find something new by simply browse and tap recommended podcasts including SiriusXM shows, on-demand whether you're on Pandora Premium, Plus or Radio.

Looking for more?

Meet Pandora Modes - The new way to customize your station experience. Choose from six different modes to switch up the kind of music you're hearing:
‚Ä¢My Station: The station experience you know and love.
‚Ä¢Crowd Faves: Hear the most üëçsongs by other listeners.
‚Ä¢Deep Cuts: Hear less familiar songs from station artists.
‚Ä¢Discovery: Hear more artists who don't usually play on this station.
‚Ä¢Newly Released: Hear the newest releases from station artists.
‚Ä¢Artist Only: Hear songs from the station artist.

Pandora Premium‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized on-demand music and podcasts

‚Ä¢ Search and play your favorite songs, podcasts, albums and playlists on-demand
‚Ä¢ Create playlists, not worklists ‚Äì on your own or powered by Pandora
‚Ä¢ Download the music you want for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized radio with ad-free music

‚Ä¢ Unlimited personalized stations and podcasts
‚Ä¢ Up to four stations for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus subscriptions are $5.99 per month. Pandora Premium subscriptions are $10.99 per month. You‚Äôll be charged as a recurring transaction through your Google Play account. Pending trial eligibility, charges for Plus >($5.99/month) or Premium ($10.99/month) begin at the end of a free trial unless you cancel 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription month. Any unused portion of a free Pandora Plus trial period will be forfeited if you upgrade to Pandora Premium. You can manage your subscription, cancel or turn off auto-renewal through Account Settings in your Google Play account. Pandora is available to US customers only.

Some advertising exclusions apply. Skips, replays and offline features may be limited by certain licensing restrictions. Pandora may use large amounts of data, and carrier data charges may apply. For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted Wi-Fi networks when available.

Terms and conditions:
www.pandora.com/legal
www.pandora.com/legal/subscription
www.pandora.com/privacy

scraped_reviews.content: The good: they have an excellent algorithm to determine and play similar music. Now, the bad: you pay for a premium subscription, and then you continue to have ads in ALL podcasts. scraped_reviews.content: why it's bad: I used to be on Pandora for a long time on different devices. it's all right but now it's just going downhill dramatically there's too many bugs and listening to music is worthless on here. and I can't even get off the app without it shutting off within 20 seconds. you try to play a game while listening to your favorite music is also worthless. and I would like it better if you didn't have to pay for a subscription. even then still buggy. everyone's saying your app is bad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for any trouble you‚Äôre experiencing. Please feel free to reach out to our support team directly for assistance: https://pandora.app.link/e/AppReview

scraped_reviews.content: I like my playlists, just takes so freaking long to find the best mixes except that occasionally I get really weird songs that don't fit my taste or the playlist I chose. the real reason the real reason I'm giving them only to stars is they keep saying I have no internet connection, when I do. and they keep asking me to upgrade to a higher tier subscription which I find heinous.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Lyn ~ Sorry to hear that! Please try running through the troubleshooting steps listed here: https://pandora.app.link/e/androidpandora

If you continue to experience issues with this, please reach out to our support team for further assistance: https://pandora.app.link/e/AppReview

title: ZEPETO: Avatar, Connect & Live
description:
Play the Universe. ZEPETO.

Welcome to ZEPETO, a place where virtually anything is possible!

[Explore Worlds]
Thousands of virtual worlds to play together with friends.
From K-pop and music to fashion, anime and role-play, there's something for everyone.

[Community of Friends]
The metaverse is at your fingertips - experience it anywhere, anytime on your mobile device.
Meet new people all over the world with the same interests as you, and stay connected in chat and feed. Join thousands tuning in to avatar livestreams real-time.

[Customize Your Avatar]
Style your avatar any way you want, bringing another you to life.
Choose from an infinite amount of the trendiest clothes, hair styles, accessories, makeup and more. Dress up your character with user-made items, well-known brands, and luxury styles!

[Become a Creator]
Don't see something you like in our shop? Bring your creativity to life by designing and selling new fashion or lifestyle items yourself in ZEPETO Studio!
Or build your own games and worlds for other users to play.

[Go LIVE!]
Start your VTuber journey on ZEPETO!
Easily create your unique avatar for free and begin streaming live on mobile and PC.

[New Social Content Daily]
New photos, videos, trends and events to experience everyday ‚Äì including top brand, artist, and influencer collaborations.
Join the latest social challenges ‚Äì create your own content for the chance to be featured or win prizes!

[Join ZEPETO Premium]
Join our premium membership program to receive special benefits like priority review for created items, 70 monthly ZEM credits, exclusive items and more.

summary: Your Avatar, Endless Fun

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app! its my favorite and I'm on it at least once everyday. I love to be able to create outfits as well. I just wish that there were more realistic looking 2d templates, if that makes sense. like with some of the 3d clothes but not exactly like it. I just like the clothes to fit better and have more of a chance to be bought. and I love having abs and belly buttons on my Avi, and some of the 2d templates don't have that. I really just want more variety.

Idk if it's just me, but recently it hasn't even let me on the app for more than 3 seconds. it'll load, then after a little while, it'll kick me off the app. it's not my internet, I've tried deleting an app to free up space, I've tried restarting my phone, ect. The app is overall fine, so I don't understand the issue. This has been happening for WEEKS now, and I feel like I might need to delete it soon.

The app is wonderful. I absolutely love it. but recently not so much. i have problems with the audio finding. I also having problems with Livestreaming. I have the required amount of internet speed, I can join others live stream, but I can't start my own. I also have a HUGE problem with the candy slime and sometimes the benefits. WHY DO I NEED A PHONE NUMBER TO VERIFY MY IDENTITY FOR AN IN GAME GAME? if you need it that bad, give an email option!! i ain't giving a phone number !!!!

ZEPETO is an awesome game! No adds, you basically have your own tick tock account. You can chat with people like a texting app. Oh, and you have your own room you can decorate. I have a lame outfit and a lame room because those things are expensive. ZEPETO is a little confusing at first but you'll figure it out. Also, when I make shorts it sometimes says "we have an issue," and 2 or 3 times it logged me out to my home screen, plz fix this issue ZEPETO team. Overall ZEPETO I recommend.

Loveee this app, the character customization and everything, but ther did a problem, most of the clothes and items cost zems, which I understand but it is also hard to get zems for me personally with playing all these games trying to get to ridicules levels, or either having to spend real money for zems which is crazy. I just hope that the zems are easier to get or either just have more items that cost coins, other than that the game is fine. I just wished more things costed coins than zems.

Cute concept and has a nice number of facial features and clothing options. Needs more diverse hair, more furniture, and more social aspects. Hopefully more minigames at some point. Problems: cannot connect email or social media account, pressing enter/done does nothing. Flying Zepeto often does not open, Zepeto must be closed and reopened for it to load. After watching ads to unlock items, they sometimes do not show up. This is on a Galaxy S9. Correcting typos can be difficult and the cursor doesn't line up with the text. Once some of these are fixed, I'd be happy to give it 5 stars.

Definately not for computer/chrome book. Whenever I try to creat a post it loads for a long time and ends up kicking me out. Videos just crash the game and whenever I exit the aplication I have to restart my computer for it to work again, most of the time the app closes randomly and deletes most of my progress. I downloaded this before and it was much less laggy and compatible with my system. I also wish there were more body types/more realistic body types, you're either a twig or a log. (idk?)

After 1 week of downloading, it has quickly become my favorite game! However, there are minor issues. When incorporating your own sound to videos, the sound often glitches. That's about the only problem there is. Since it's a small issues I still rate it 5 stars. One thing I learned, is you have to be on wifi to upload a post. If you are considering downloading, just keep that in mind! Lastly, most ads are optional.ü§≠ Omg alsoooo make sure to be the age limitüò¨

the game is cute, but crashes a lot. i thought the new color picker would've been free but- haha! it isn't üôÑ back when i first played the game, it was pretty chill and cute, but now it seems like more and more of another cash grab. the chatrooms are dead and just trying to send a message causes the whole game to lag. character customization is nice, but clothing is pretty limited due to the zems and stuff. hopefully it gets better in the future. :/

I absolutely love this game. There's a few things i do not like. First of all the zems. You can't get zems easily. You either have to pay for them or wait about a week to earn 1 singular zem. Next, the ads. I'm absolutely sick of the ads. Whenever you have to watch an ad, you don't watch an ad you watch 2, and I rather not watch 2 long ads that you can't skip. Lastly whenever I get to make a video, it lags. I get that it may be my problem but if it's not. Please fix it!

It's a great and fun app. You can add friends and take photos with them. You can also buy many cool clothes and shoes and etc. However I'm giving this a 3 star because when I log out of my account I type my password but it's wrong so I go and click "forgot password" I did that and went to my email and type the temporary password yet it don't work. So logging back to ur account it's pretty difficult. This happen to me 2 times so Zepeto you need to fix your log in thing.

This app is pretty great overall. Since it is new, I hope in the future some updates to make it even more enjoyable. Such as to have more weight sizes. You can customize the face to be chubby, but it would look odd on a skinny body. So I suggest allowing members to choose their body type in the beginning or sth. Also have some more variations in the clothing and style. Like a section for hats, one for jackets and scarves, and so on. Maybe also make the room a little larger so we can really make it us more, cuz it I really loVe decorating. You could also maybe have actual places to go on the streets and still be able to see and interact with other people. Like, a mall or sth. Anyways, those are just some cool ideas I had, you don't haVe to do them unless you see fit. I also wish I could see other people's follower and following. I need some new mini games too cuz that box one glitches too much, at least for me.

The characters were cute, but I noticed that it was quite laggy. I could never watch adds nor could I log in sometimes, which kinda annoyed me. I also heard some weird noises from the game, like white static. Isn't that usually what you hear when the phone camera's recording? It creeped me out. I've heard a lot about this app secretly recording you and getting hacked; I can't really say It's true but I'd rather play it safe and uninstall.

It's a good social media app and I've grown to love it. I just wish that instead of just letting the "popular" Zepeto creators (the ones with the most followers) live stream, I think everyone shouod be able to live stream and talk with their followers. I know I would want to do that. Also I don't really like how there's a limit or word count when you post something. I feel like if we wanna post a picture with a whole paragraph we should be able to fo that. But other than that, I love this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your interest in ZEPETO Live. Unfortunately, ZEPETO Live is limited to some users for the first time to test the broadcasting environment. We'll try to make sure that many users can do the Live later, so please wait a little bit. Thank you for your understanding and feedback on the limit on the number of characters.

scraped_reviews.content: The graphics are great and its fun BUT there are still some bugs that i would like to be fixed, Like the fact that i cant put my own pictures as a background because the background just turns black, or sometimes when i click the box that the wheel is in, the menu for that shows up as on half of the screen, and the text displayed shows up in a different language. Please fix these!! I love the game and would love to give it 5 stars.

I really like this app! However, I don't know if it's just my phone, but there seems to be some type of glitch where people's characters would have red question marks on their faces (around the eye region and on the skin) and the same goes for the furniture. If it's the app please fix it! Also please add more hair (preferably curly hair, like afros), more games, and more furniture, and also more ways to communicate with others, like being able to post pictures and things like that! Also like another review I read, more body types. Other than that, this app does keep me happy!

now that im (finally) past the loading screen, i can write a better review on this! i really enjoy using this app, the characters are really cute! but it could certainly use some improvements. for example, the app is really buggy, and you cant tell for sure whether something you clicked on will work or not. i also think there should be more features, like maybe a wider variety of hair choices or more ways you can get money. overall, the app is rly fun to use, but a lot of things need to be worked on!!

Character creation at its best! But overall app, kinda sucks? ZEPETO seems to be aiming for a new form of Bitmoji/social media hybrid. The problem? Its too open, and less social. When writing a status, you only have a few words, craming a sentence into a small space, not really getting a point across. Also, everything you post Anyone can see! Personally, I'd like to keep things with friends and family, and if I wanted I could go public. But even so, status don't really share much, I'd like to see it expanded, perhaps tapping the bubble could bring down more text. Its overall a nice idea, and with some improvements could be a nice new form of social media. Good luck ZEPETO Team. :)

It seemed like a cool idea because I love the personalization type stuff, plus all my friends were starting to make them, but my excitement soon turned into frustration. I got excited that there were so many things to do; games, quests, interaction with other people, extra outfits and hair to choose from, and even the part where they scan your photo was pretty accurate, however, the game glitches, the daily gift glitches, quests have worked for probably a week, and messaging is messed up. It's basically a dress up game at this point.

its alright, it keeps crashing and shutting down for no reason. its also very laggy and buggy and slow. ex: when i try to take a photo, it will crash! none of my other apps ever do that. also, sometimes it freezes. but all the characters are cute. i wish there was some code we can SCAN instead of memorizing all the letters to follow someone. other than that, i just have a huge problem with it not letting me take pictures. and it never lets me type or show my keyboard. also why are all the characters skinny? please have an option for bigger people. also, make more hairstyles/accessories for different cultures. good concept, needs LOADS of improvement.

I like the game, It's very entertaining. But, there's not much to do after a while and you eventually become bored. This game definitely has great potential, though. Also, It'd be nice to include different body types and hair types and have interactions with the other players and if you could make more rooms instead of one to decorate. Also, the game is very lagfy recently because the game went viral and would take a long time to open the app and whenever I create a new character and take a picture it automatically detects me as a bald white man. Please fix this.

The app is cute and I personally love it. Could you please clear up some of the things that people are saying that it can track your location and steal your information? It's scaring people, but I don't see how the app could access any of that information because it only asks for permission to three things but ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. And every time I close the app or I'm not on it for an extended period of time my eyebrows go away and I have to put them back on every time I open the app again. It's very annoying, could you please fix it? And I can't put backgrounds on the pictures, the background just turns black. I lover the app over all, it just has some issues and pretty slow due to the sudden gain of members. Thank you!

It's extremely laggy and buggy. It took me an hour just create the username and password. I was tapping on the blue check mark but it did nothing for a long time after tapping continuously and sometimes it even deleted what I had typed out. Flying ghost is just really annoying. You have to tap ON the box or else you die. It would be a lot easier if you can just tap anymore and have more control. I had to delete SNOW, my step tracker and spotify in order for it to even process. It's still slow and laggy. Otherwise it's pretty cute.

So far it's good. There is a minor bug issue, the game freezes and you can't do anything, only thing to do is hit your back button to exit game and clear out the background and restart. I wish there were more mini games to play. And more ways to earn coins. Other than that game is easy peasy and some what fun. It's a time killer that's for sure.

This app I think is one of the cutest. What they have is great but their customization is lacking just a bit. Like I think there could be mkre hair styles and hair colors (more than one color for people with died hair?). But what I think is ruining the app for me is the bugs that I am experiencing. My Zepeto profile picture looks all staticky. I can't see my Emojis that I make, and I can't seem to find some of my friends! Until these bugs are fixed I don't think I can enjoy this app as much as I wanted.

I like this app, it was a good idea and the character designs are quite cute, but there quite a few glitches that just get really frustrating. For instances really dark red circles fo around characters eyes or the whole character itself turns bright red and can't be changed back. Also due to how many people were on the app was quite laggy, especially in the streets, it gets so laggy to the point my phone completely freezes sometimes. Finally, I wish you added more items in the shop or for the character in general to fit every players actual style or how they might actually dress and have their hair. Due to all of these issues I had uninstalled the game, but because I liked it I am willing to give it a second chance.

needs more diverse hair styles, body types, and more mini games would be cool! it's a new app so i understand that it needs time, but hopefully we see these updates in the future. very good game and the customization is unbelievably creative. no character looks the same! I've been waiting for a game like this for a while and im completely satisfied. once there's more updates my rating will definity be 5 stars.

It's cute, but before I left the hairstyle section I was already a bit disappointed in the app and the diversity (or rather lack thereof). This definitely isn't designed with Black girls and their hairstyles and type in mind. Almost every other avatar creation app has at least one option that is remotely acceptable. This one really doesn't. The rest of the avatar creation is ok.

I'm not sure if other people are having this issue, but first off, I am unable to stay in the Zepeto Street/Towns for more than 5 minutes at a time before it kicks me off. When this happens, my character also reverts it's name back to the original name I had since creating the character, my clothes that I purchased for the character end up being LOCKED with an ad, and my greetings all deleted. This has happened since I updated the app; not sure if it's just me or others noticed this issue.

I only use the character creation part and it's cute, but this game is very sneaky. They make it EXTREMELY difficult to earn any in-game currency, which I assume is just to make you use real money. I played to level 18 of a game and signed up for a random website to earn "zems" and neither worked. The slime feeding game is extremely tedious as well. This wouldn't be much of a problem if the majority of the items in the game didn't use "zems," but everything seems like a trick in this app.

This game is really fun and its cool to see myself as a well portrayed character. But after the newest update the only feature that works properly without lag is the lottery section. Every single other part of this game lags, and some so much that's it's literally impossible to play. For example, when I try to take a photo from the photo booth section and try to select a solid background color for my photo, it's impossible to slide left to see all the color options due to lag. Please fix the lag

Great app! Needs improvement. The clothes are starting to get really expensive and the tasks are always on hold.. Also, I have a Samsung and I've noticed that when I play on an iPhone it's much better. When I spin the wheel thing, it only shows half of it and when I click to earn the money I have to restart the all because it just freezes. The game is kinda boring when there are no tasks and the clothes are too expensive because you're gonna have to wait for another task to get more money in order to buy to the clothes. I love it and see lots of potential. Keep up the good work ‚ô°

I love this app and I go on it everyday! but ever since the new update, features have become more laggy. for an example, i'll try to click on my own post or someone else's that's a video, and it freezes my screen and never loads. eventually it actually kicks me out of the app and says "zepeto is not responding" or something. also, for the mini games, it lags so much and it always freezes in the middle of the game, kicking me out or causing me to not move. the alien game button doesn't work.

I keep completing the tasks to earn the ZEM (gems) and I haven't received ANYTHING for it. I completely various surveys just to not get anything. It's not fair! It's super cute but it takes ages to load. Also, there is virtually no way to earn Zems (except for the "lucky" option where you can win like 1-2 max, and buying it of course). I wish there was a game to help earn those since so many items in game cost zems
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you are not a suitable survey responder for the survey, the survey will not be provided. Apologies for the inconvenience. üò• [Settings-Storage space management] Please trying clearing your cache. If the problem persists, please contact [Customer Center] and we will help you separately.

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is a pretty nice concept. But there are so many things missing or certain bugs that just make it pretty damn annoying. Just to make some suggestions, you guys should definitely add many, many more hairstyles/clothing options in general and in the shop, along with more furniture. But a huge bug ai constantly have to deal with is when I try to message someone, it send me to messaging myself for some reason... And I restart the app/my phone and it the message still pops up with me as the recipient. Please fix this. Other than that one bug, good app.

I've reviewed before, but now that it's been a couple years, I'm reviewing again. Zem is really hard to get, even now. In the games, the controls are absolutely terrible and super stiff and buggy. It has a delay at times. It doesn't help when certain games are based around parkour. Aside from that, ads are very minimal and always optional, which is definitely a plus. The new slime game is frustrating.

It's a super cute app and there's a lot of fun stuff to do with it, although the app will sometimes kick me out when trying to take certain photos, it bring in the street. The daily quest aren't working and whenever I play Flying Zepeto it glitches, I wish there was more ways to earn money, or at least make the clothes cheaper to buy if money is going to be so hard to make. Other than that, the outfits are super cute!

Overall it's a cute game. However, it has some technical problems. The Free Zems quests rarely load, I've only been able to do those once. The mini games work sometimes, and there's one mini game that seems broken. On the plus side, the graphics are pretty nice and the worlds are fun. The regular coins aren't too hard to obtain, unless the mini games don't work. I like how when you watch an ad for a chance at money it always gives you at least a little bit of coins even if you don't win.

Really fun and good game to play. I loved my experience for the most part, but I'm also quite upset because my account had somehow disappeared? I tried my username, password, email, google, phone number, all of them! But it simply says there is no account under these details. I had almost 1k followers, so this sent me in a state of shock and anxiety. I've tried to get it back every way possible, but nothing happened.

Okay, First off, this is a good app, however, I had an account much before having to use email, Facebook, and etc for an account. This account also had tons of items and a lot of my friends on it, due to having to use Facebook or email, I have lost ALL of of those items and cannot find any of my friends. If there is a way to recover everything such as my Zepeto and items please let me know

It's a cute app. Character creation is my favorite thing, so Zepeto definitely delivers. My only hang-up is that buying assets does add up. Maybe there could be promotional events where certain items are free for a while? Also, it tends to heat up my phone and drain battery rather quickly, so I have to be careful of when I use it. Other than that, I like it. The community is fun and I like seeing how other people express themselves. :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Starry, Thank you for your feedback on price! We'll save your feedback for internal discussion. The overhitting issue is associated with the device itself rather than the app. Unfortunately there's not much we can help you. ;-( Could you check your device? Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I really do like the app and all the customization and the opportunity to find new friends but there are too many glitches. It maybe be just on my phone but after a couple of days of downloading the app, my Avatar's skin turned red. Also, there is a glitch with a type of eyebrow and when you apply it, it gives you a weird blotch on your face but I checked with my friends and they say that they can't see the disfigurement. Please fix.

The rumors about Zepeto tracking and listening and snooping are fake, all easily debunked, so don't worry about that. Every phone makes noises in the speaker all the time no matter what app you use. It just does that, it doesn't mean they're listening. It would be good if you could change/customize body types and height, that would be cool.

This game is good, but I don't like the bug and lag. When I tried to play games on zepeto, it will normally bug. Unlike the past, zepeto was fun and not cringy. But that's not the problem. The problem is when I try to customize zepeto head shapes and most body parts. It will immediately bug my phone. I could watch live and videos, but I can't play most popular games and customize the body parts.This game also have network errors. Which made it even more laggy. Please fix this game bug.

I invited a friend and they accepted. I didn't get any food to feed my slimes. Apparently there's no place to input ur invite code, we looked. They play on iPad so maybe that's it. I have noticed that the way everything is put together is way different on phone than iPad, like some things don't even show up. Other than that it's just not a fun game. It's trying to be roblox and tiktok at the same time and it doesn't work. Plus most of the games are buggy anyways.

Can you please make going live more available. for android, you need 8GB of RAM, my phone has 4GB but has another 4GB in extended RAM, it doesn't mention anything about extended RAM or whether or not it's acceptable, so maybe mention that. and I still have 75GB of storage available, it said to make sure I have enough and I clearly do, I don't get what the issue is. I've been wanting to start streaming since I started, it's annoying.

Needs an update on trendy poses and dances. Plus a lot more dances with multiple people, bug fixes ( it won't let me post, nor use poses ), but it's fun just needs a lot of approvements. Especially with the bugs.. every day at this point it's lagging taking me back to my homescreen and stuff and alot of my friends stop using the app cause of the bugs. Please fix the issue as soon as possible. And ban more ppl I reported a girl for posting shes happy a girl kys and she didn't get banned.

This app is quite good but there are some issues. 1. I can't add sound to my video nor I can take photos with my friends. 2. whenever I enter a world Zepeto kicks me out and cause of that I'm not able to play in worlds. 3. Getting zems from games is so hard, I completed so many games but never received the rewards. 4. Zems are so expensive. 5. most of the coin items are turning into zems. because of all these issues Zepeto isn't fun at all

it's a good social app,you can meet new friends,create your own avatar,play games all in one app! The only problem I have with it is when you're playing jump master,as soon as you reach the second level(dark blue)and clain the jump coin,it says "error,you lost connection,try to reconnect" it's not only once when this happened,it happens everytime I try to play,no matter how strong my Internet is,I recommend,but you might face the same problem as meüò∂

game is good, but I wish the gems would be free or would be learnable (you can watch 10 ads for 1) and so that people can get gems and be able to spend them on clothes. Otherwise, the coin options are limited and often not as nice as the gem items. I like that I can do dances with my friends, and it is a good app. The games on it are a little laggy, but some are worth playing. I do wish Zepeto could have fewer ads. I would give more but it is a little laggy and I don't like the gems.

descriptionHTML:
All your favorite readings contained in one place for both hardcore fans and first-time comic readers!
Toomics is the top premium subscription webtoon service with every genre and fantasy imaginable!

> Find Only on Toomics
Exclusive titles from professional artists in the industry!
Set your eyes on the jaw-dropping, full-color artwork and stories!
You won‚Äôt be able to find this new addiction anywhere else!

> Keep Track of our Daily Updates
New episodes updated weekly for all series so you can read your favorite comics everyday!
Delve deeper and deeper everyday with endless updates and new series!

> Check Out your Favorite Genres!
Action, Romance, BL, Drama, Thriller and everything in between!
If you‚Äôre an avid reader and you‚Äôre looking for something new, then look no more others!
Explore all our best and hottest titles, and experience the best quality you deserve!

> Sign up for a free account and get Trial Episodes!
Sign up a Toomics account and discover your new favorite stories!
Get a taste of what we have for free!

> Manage your own Favorites
Fill your own personal favorites with comics of your selection so you can keep track of your favorites!
Don‚Äôt forget our personalized recommendations if you ever need more!

summary: Toomics is a premium comic service with every genre for all readers to enjoy!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is lacking the bare minimum. It randomly kicked me off the comics as if I never signed in. At first, I thought, well, that was weird and annoying but fixed it really quickly and went back to reading. Since then, it has been doing this with an increasing frequency, and worse, I only used my Google account to log in, and it doesn't recognize that anymore. Unexpectedly, though not shockingly so, it appears this has been an issue for many others for some time now.

scraped_reviews.content: I found a pretty interesting comic on an ad, it's a comic that is 18 plus. I thought it was funny that when you get the app and try to read it there, the policy is that android blocks something where you can't turn family friendly mode off, ok go to Google on my phone. Look up toomics, and I'm suddenly able to turn the mode off and view the comic with the same exact loging as the app. Overall it just seems like they are trying to get money to view all the comics, pretty unsatisfied about that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review. We apologize for the inconvenience. In accordance with the policy of the Google Play Store and Apple App Store, we are unable to include certain contents in our app. If you want to read our adult comics, please access them via our website either through your PC or through a web browser on your mobile phone.

scraped_reviews.content: Toomics is a premium paid app. You subscribe to the app in order to get free unlimited comics. Lezhin, Tappytoon, and Tapas are also premium apps but you pay per comic instead, mostly between $.25 and $.40 per comic. Since Toomics is a subscription based service you will need to read more comic per week to average out the prices to match the per chapter pricing. It is a great deal if you want to read a lot of comics but a not so good deal if you only like a few series. I like the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello and thank you for your review.
We are happy to hear that you are enjoying our app :)
We hope you have a great time reading and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at our 1:1 Customer Service! We will gladly assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I honestly don't use the app, I just go to the website cause that's where all the good stuff is *wink wink* but just wanted to leave a review on here on how responsive customer service is when you have payment issues and trouble with transactions. I requested a refund for an accidental purchase and recieved it within 2 hours. Makes purchasing from this company an easier choice to make!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a decent web novel app but that's all it is, just decent. You can get away with not having a membership, which is excellent. The content is pretty diverse and has something for everyone. Two main issues. 1. The app, NEVER keeps me logged in and sometimes even logs me out after finishing a chapter. The constant logging in is annoying 2. While content is good, and this isn't necessarily the fault of the app, a lot of comics suffer from an open ended ending with no hints at a sequel

We will also continue to add more series to our users.

scraped_reviews.content: Finally able to get an understanding of how the app works and a response from customer service. The app only allows you to view family safe content and it's annoying that the full scope of the app isnt accessible because that's its purpose, convenience. If I had known that I'd have to login to my account online and not use the app at all I wouldn't have purchased a membership. They do have wonderful content but little variety so if your okay with online only then it isnt so bad, but inconvenient

scraped_reviews.content: Not much horror/thriller to choose from. The comics I was reading and absolutely loved, "The witch and her zombie son" and "Nightmare" are both now only VIP. Based on the reviews, everyone else is having this problem. I honestly wouldn't mind if the app added ads for some sort of currency to unlock episodes, many other comic apps do. I would love to continue reading those two comics but I cant find them anywhere else, I truly hope something changes.

scraped_reviews.content: I wanted to give this a good review but I gotta go with just average. The app itself works fine, not too glaring, and I dont mind paying a sub to read unlimited. What IS a problem is that not all their comics are on their app, meaning that you have to jump between their app and the website to get the full experience and thats honestly unacceptable to me. If you're gonna ask for a subscription, make sure your app has EVERYTHING.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review. We apologize for the inconvenience. scraped_reviews.content: Been a Toomics user for a while now, and it sucks that you have to pay to get past 3 episodes... Yes, you can only read up to 3 episodes and have to pay. Pretty useless app if you wanna just read comics, because no one wants to only read 3 episode. I'd say webtoon is better.

scraped_reviews.content: the app is for family content only and you can get your subscription here but the website is way better they have uncensored mangas and adult books only downside is that you pay a subscription but still need to pay for coins for the adult stuff so they definitely trying to get your money more than once. unlike honeytoon pay once and your there. so not bad on the website but like I said they double charge you. But also a great and large selection of regular mangas. so that's a plus.

Won't let me sign in. It keeps saying the account already exists and to sign in, i do then it cycles right back around saying the account already exist and to sign in. Had no problem taking the money for that account but can't handle letting me log in.

scraped_reviews.content: I personally think the subscription price is too high if you read a small number of series. Cant reach customer support, and my credit card is on file so they will recharge my card. A truly awful experience with this company. There is no reason for this to happen and I get logged out and then not even be able to reach out for support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review! We apologize for the inconvenience you have been experiencing. If you need further assistance regarding the problems you are having, please do not hesitate to contact our 1:1 Customer Service Team through en.help@toomicsglobal.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This is hardly an app. It's just the website on your phone that you have to download to read new comic updates faster. I constantly get signed out despite telling it to keep me signed in which is very annoying. The website has a fake coin system but the app shows it's just their membership plan. It's inconsistent and confusing :/ UPDATE: I dont have a problem with VIP membership. The app just isnt really an app and keeps signing me out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review! We apologize for the inconvenience you have been experiencing. If you need further assistance regarding the problems you are having, please do not hesitate to contact our 1:1 Customer Service Team through en.help@toomicsglobal.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Used it for a while, not a lot of great content available. Attempted to cancel but there is a literal loop that stops you from cancelling vip. Everything tells you to go to app store to manage subscriptions, where it literally just sends you back to the download page on the store stating underneath your subscription. Click on it and it sends you back to the new manage subscriptions button and then right back into the app store. Basically a complete scam for money
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review. We apologize for the inconvenience you have been experiencing with our service. Please contact us at our 1:1 Customer Service, or at en.help@toomicsglobal.com, we will gladly assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Definetly too good to be true. I saw a previous review and I totally agree with it. You only get about three free episodes then you have to pay for the rest, which sucks because I thought it was completely free. I get you guys need to make money but at least increase the free amount of episodes we get then I might be able to edit my review
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your review. We apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced with us. We are very sorry that all of the comics are not free. This decision has been made with the desire to protect our artists' copyrights, therefore, we hope for your kind understanding and cooperation. Thank you for giving us a chance.

scraped_reviews.content: The coin system helps by allowing you to but comics and some people like buying the coins. That could go to the artist. You have good comics but the rating is bad bc of the VIP membership. Look at other apps for example I'm not saying you have to be like them but making a change would certainly help. It doesn't even have to be that. Could so a video thing that allows you to read up to 3 more comics but it only happens once. Just something that helps people with little money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your reply. Thank you again for your suggestion and we will think of other alternatives in the future. We are always striving to provide our customers with the best experiences. We will take your kind suggestion into consideration. Thank you for giving Toomics a chance. :)

scraped_reviews.content: (1) Remove "most favorite" on the Favorite tab. Or at least put a space between them. I hate those webtoons being side by side with the webtoons I actually tagged as favorite. (2) Make "Complete" or "Plus" app version that can view mature comics. Have it avail to download on your site. Other webtoon companies do that. (3) Not enough webtoons to justify its price for VIP membership. I'd rather buy them separately through coins or other types of payment if that's the case.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello and thank you for your review. 

We are always appreciating each and every review of our users and we truly value what is most convenient for everyone! We are in works of adding more webtoon series in our app. We do have other ongoing series from our service so we encourage you to give it a try. Thank you for giving Toomics a chance. :)

scraped_reviews.content: It aint all that bad, the comics are great, and most of the stories you can read for free but some of the comics that you want to read are forced to buy literally 2/3rds of the comic just to read, idk if this is normal but it seems a bit weird when compared to other comics. It makes sense to do this as to keep the artist paid but it seems a bit awkward as this can ward off a lot of potential customers that more or less just want to read a good comic.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, Ashes! Thank you for your review.

We are glad to know you enjoy our services. We are also very thankful for your feedback. Toomics is always striving to provide better reading experiences for our users. If you have any questions or need assistance. Please contact the Toomics English Customer Service Team for help. We will gladly help you!

title: Tapas ‚Äì Comics and Novels
description:
The Ultimate App for Comics, Novels, Mangas, Manhwas, Webtoons and More!‚ÄîDiscover Your Next Favorite Story with Tapas

Love comic books and engaging stories? Looking for the perfect way to pass the time? Tapas is the go-to app for those who crave captivating tales. Whether you love romance, action, fantasy, or BL, Tapas has something for everyone. Discover new chapters released daily, with exclusive free episodes dropping every three hours. 

Get hooked on international sensations and trending Tapas Original Series like:

- The Beginning After the End
- Solo Leveling
- Little Rabbit and the Big Bad Leopard
- A Business Proposal
- Heartstopper
- Moving

Only on Tapas, you can enjoy many of these mega-hit series in both webcomic and novel versions. And thanks to the Wait-Until-Free system, you can enjoy them for free! Simply wait for your timer to run out, and you can read the next episode for free. Or, grab multiple episodes in bundles with the best deal to keep the excitement going!

No need to stop at a bookstore or the library to read comic books when you can explore an endless library of stories spanning everything from premium comics/novels, Tapas Originals, K-content, to indie comics, right in the palm of your hand. Indulge in isekai adventures, otome game stories, breathtaking romantasy, and so on!

Download the app and engage with 10 million other readers and creators. Get notified about updates on your favorite series. Plus, you‚Äôll have access to app-exclusive perks like Gift Passes and free Ink. Try your luck on the weekly Fortune Cookies every Monday carrying random amounts of bonus Ink!

Want to write your own epic saga? Tapas is also the perfect platform to share your creativity with a supportive global audience. Join over 75,000 talented creators‚Äîfrom established, award-winning authors to aspiring independent artists‚Äîand publish your work on Tapas.

Turn your phone time into story time with Tapas‚Äîyour go-to destination for the comic books, romance stories, and episodes you crave!

Website: http://www.tapas.io
Email: feedback@tapas.io
Instagram: @tapas_app
Twitter: @tapas_app
Facebook: Tapas

Website: http://www.tapas.io
