scraped_reviews.content: Day 5, and wow! I chose to go the expert route and do the hardest workout because I was a bodybuilder many years ago and figured I should start at an expert level. let me tell you something it is certainly working and it is not easy. at least not for me when I'm coming back after all these years. And after only 5 days I already see some results which is amazing. I feel amazing and I actually look forward to doing these workouts. App is absolutely wonderful to point you in the right to direction.

I'm halfway through my first 30 days. mildly surprised that I've mostly stuck with it and have found the diverse exercises very useful. I've tended to have decent abdominal health but never truly 'in shape.' This app has helped. First, they scale up in difficulty as you begin the exercises. Your standard workout is 10-15 minutes with breaks. At the end I was surprised, I felt the workout but wasn't exhausted. I survived skipping a few days during the holidays and the app reminded me. Helpful.

I'm only on my third week but already love the way this app walks me through the steps, including rest periods, and introduces new exercises. At 57 years old I've found out that walking more and eating less doesn't get rid of my "love handles". I need the regiment this app provides. Using the alarm setting really helps keep me on track. I already see progress. And, progress is progress no matter how small.

I am pleasantly surprised to see how well this works. Only been about a week and I can tell the difference. I know if I commit to this, I will see my six pack again. And if anyone is concerned about ads or some kind of hidden cost, don't be. Ads can be skipped instantly when they do come up. Otherwise, the only ads are during the workout in banners during the 30 second breaks. Not even video ads. I don't hand out five stars like candy. I will edit this later on with a hopefully better result.

Good for people with limited time. I wanted an exercise routine that I can actually stick with which means needed to be doable within a short amount of time (I can do the program within 15-20 minutes/day), be customizable (app differentiates between beginner, intermediate and advanced and gives the option to adjust within that too--great), and well explained to get the right effect and prevent injury (apps has well-made short videos for each exercise). Good value overall.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Wolfram! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review. We appreciate your kind words and will keep improving our app to bring you a better experience. For any other issues, please feel free to contact us via " Me -> Feedback".We are always happy to hear from you!üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I hate reviewing stuff. It just isn't my thing, however this app is amazing. It is free so commercials/ads come with it, but they aren't overbearing. Moreover, they proceed at the end of the workout! Also, if you want more you tell the program to challenge you more and it does at a fair increment instead of 100%. Thus, it supplies a little more for you, which you feel, instead forcing you to take back the gain you want because it was too much of an increase. This is perfect!

Over all seems like a good app. The workouts are built to start easy and slowly build you up, but there are different levels so you can start harder, if you want. My biggest complaint is the reminders don't seem to work correctly. If I miss 1 workout, I don't receive any more notifications, even though I have it setup to remind me everyday.

Great progression. Starts easy and asks at the end of the workout how it was so it can taylor your next workout for you. Quick workout, so it's easy to fit into a busy schedule. No extra equipment needed. Good variety, so I'm not doing the same boring thing everyday. So far, I've been motivated to stay with it. Ads are minimal and at beginning or end and aren't disruptive or annoying. I'm downloading another app by the same developer because I like this one so much. Nice job!

I really like this app. The intensity is just right if you stay consistent. I have only tried level one. It start off easy then gets harder at the end. I really like the repeat of exercises and alway ends with stretching. I wanted to try this out even though, I know I'm not a man. I'm really happy I did and this is my favorite exercise app! Thank you!

Tried it for day 1. I can appreciate that there are stretching exercises in place of pause. This strategy, as much as I can tell, seems to allow for increased results while still allowing the body to rest. I know myself well enough to know that if there was a pause button, I more likely will not continue the remainder of my regiment! Very smart!!

Quick, easy and convenient. I havent used this app for a while but when I was in better shape it was the best mini core workout that I could do anywhere. Now I am finally back to focusing on my health after having children and what was once a finisher is now far more challenging. The app is free and will give you a nice little core workout with a breakdown of each workout. I cannot say anything bad about. I recommend it to friends all the time that want to get in better shape before summer!

Was looking for a simple ab-focused workout to supplement my regular training and thought I would try this one. As of day 10 I am VERY impressed. The workout is quick (10 min or so), very intense (but does not require American Ninja level athletic ability), and thus far has been very effective. I would not recommend it for your "be all end all" / this be your only workout but as a supplement to running and weight training it's hard to imagine something better. Looking forward to seeing effects!

I've started and stopped on this plan a couple times when the app was still new. I came back to it a couple months ago just to have a tangible plan for keeping in shape and the new features like telling it if a workout was too easy or too hard so it scales to your level makes it so much better. I'm almost at the end of the intermediate course, and while I don't have a chiseled six pack I do have pretty clearly defined abs and almost no gut, which is a huge improvement from where I started.

I wasn't expecting much from this app, but I needed a workout plan and a constant reminder to work out. So I downloaded the app. I am happy to say, this app is honestly AWESOME. It sends u a notification every day and the workouts are simple, well explained, and encouraging. I have seen a lot of progress and I have abs despite being only 2 months in. The one thing though is that you aren't going to actually get abs unless you also change your daily excercise and eating habits. Awesome nonetheles

At first I though this would be an ad filled junk workout app that wanted to make money more than help beginners with weight and midsection problems. This app gets you going and has a "Siri-esque" voice coach to help you during each workout. Each set is no longer than 30 seconds and when I finish each day I feel like I can do more. Within the first week I have lost 2 pounds along with dieting. This has helped by increasing heart rate and focusing exercises on midsection. Great job and thank you!

I'm pretty athletic, but you know, Covid-19 messed up a lot of athletes. Anyways, I've wanted to try this app for awhile, but I just never got around to it. But after around 15 days on the advanced level, I feel stronger. I'm not sure if my abdominals are visually changing, but I'm not done with the 30 days yet, and will likely do the program again with less rest days. Overall a great app, easy to follow, and really encouraging!

This app is great. I'd recommend this and other exercising apps from this same company. It's the best workout partner that's freeüëç. The adds don't interrupt the exercises and aren't frequent. And after the first day you start with this app, it sets a time to remind you to start the next day (which is handy). You can change the notification to any time that best fits your schedule. You can really feel the differenceüí™üòé when you start.

Great thus far, I use it, my nephew and a few others I know. The app works great, very easy to follow and easy to adapt. I like the option of skipping through the rest points or even an exercise if its too difficult. Of course you can't literally get a 6 pack in 30 days but it will definitely start to show. Just keep using the app and depending on your starting point, within 60 days you'll definitely see results; either smaller waist/less belly fat or see major muscles poking their way through.

Awesome home workouts. I'd give it 5 stars, but not all of their exercises target muscles, some are more for stretching. I stretch before working out, so some of the exercises could be replaced with more intense ones, however, this app teaches you so many exercises that you could make your own set of exercises from what you've learned.

I've been using this app for several years. It has a very nice progression from beginner to advanced. I can pick up where I left off or if I've slacked for a while I can reset and start over. If I am unsure on how to do an exercise I can choose to watch a video which links to a real person performing the exercise. I do wish they offered other training options like videos, just stretching, or challenges to make it more entertaining

Really well built app. Unfortunately, I completed the first 30 days and am now 9 days in to to the second set of 30 days, and the exercises are much easier and quantities lower than they were at the end of the first 30 days. I feel like I'm losing progress. I wish moving on to the second set followed more linearly from the first set. I do like the daily reminders, the variety, and it's really easy (mentally) to just follow along with the workout.

I've never been athletic or one to go to a gym daily. After only 8 days of using I feel myself losing belly fat, gaining muscle in my chest, and I can see the 6 pack forming. I love the reminder and the visual of how to correctly do the exercise. It makes me feel like I have a trainer. Also if you've completed the exercise for the day you can go back later and do them over. I started on "Belly Fat" and look forward to completing the next 2 levels. I definitely recommend this app to get in shape.

I have discovered muscles using this app that I never knew where there. It is instructional, challenging, flexible, efficient and gets results. Highly recommend for those wanting to workout at home but still useful in a gym routine (when we get out again). It keeps a limited diary and the user's goals are structured. The ads are not obnoxious and well placed so I actually read them! My only complaint is that I can't get it to share data with my Fitbit.

Great for all levels. If you don't know where to begin, this app walks you through. If you're experienced/expert, then you know what variation of the exercises you can do. It's simple. Some exercises give users variations of the exercise. One thing I wish it had was the ability to choose your rest time. I end up just skipping, but would like if I could just choose a shorter/longer time.

One week in and pretty impressed so far. I'm relatively in shape and this took my normal ab routine and expanded it. Like the different levels of difficulty a lot. But keep in mind. If you are very over weight or have a huge gut, the results won't be as definitive. I'm very active and find the highest level of this to be above average in terms of challenge. App is well laid out and the animations are great. This is pretty much an animated ab hiit circuit. All in all, fantastic.

I used this app off and on for a year during covid with decent but inconsistent results due to lack of consistent use. I then committed on July 27th to complete the full 90 day program, 30 days of each level. As of today 11/11, I have lost 13 lbs and feel incredible, more fit than I've felt in years, a much stronger core than I had ever imagined. The exercise, reminders and records are very motivating and keep me looking forward to the next day. This app is a life changer of you stick to it.

Great for it being a free app. I am on day 23 of 30. The reminder helps a lot, it remind you every 20 hours to workout. The only issue with the app, is that the breaks (every 3 days), sometimes mess up the counts. Hard to explain but if you see break, don't even click on it and press finish or complete because it will disappear and it will throw off your schedule. Hopefully they fix that glitch.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry to bring you this inconvenience. We will be grateful if you can send us the screenshots of this bug via sixpackfeedback@gmail.com and fix this problem as soon as we can.

scraped_reviews.content: I am just a kid wanting to work on my body for the future. Though some of the wokouts on advanced are pretty hard i'm getting by just fine. I really love how it shows animations, showing you how to do the workout, also how it reminds me when to do my workout at a specific time that you choose. I really love this app and i've seen other reviews talking about hw their ads are a problem but not for me yet (hopefully). But overall it is a really good easy to use app.

For a free app, this one is probably the best out there this company. Anyways, there are several different apps that I use highly recommended. Ads are not too bad, the only thing I can suggest would be to have the ability to remove and exercise and add a different one when there is an exercise that is not at your level. The whole entire set may be perfect, but there may be one exercise that you just can't do. I just do a different exercise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your support and lovely advice. We will take your suggestions seriously and will try our best to make some improvements on this function to bring you a better experience. For any other issues, please feel free to contact us via Me-> Feedback. We will always be here to help!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app here and there for years now, and it's delivered consistent quality. I especially appreciate that you can induce it to increase/decrease difficulty in future workouts based on the one you just had. This way you don't need to switch to an entirely different plan if the difficulty isn't well calibrated to where you're currently at.

I started using this app because I gained a lot of weight (about 30 pounds in 4 months) due to working remotely and a sedentary, overeating lifestyle. I give full credit to this app, about 30 minutes of walking/day, and a more balanced diet for having lost 11 pounds in 30 days and an inch and a half of belly fat so far. The exercises are adjustable to your needs, easy to learn, & the right balance between challenging & doable. I restarted the beginner's track and plan to go to the next levels

Good app. Assuming no prior medical conditions, it is impossible for a user who does the workouts in full, 30 days in a row, at the advanced level, to not build the muscle needed for a 6-pack. lf a user can't feel or see the results, they're either lying to themselves and/or they have a terrible diet. That said, the app could improve in that department. The voice isn't great, but my big beef with it is that I can't get it off phone even after I uninstall it!

I haven't had a ton of experience with work out apps. This app is the second work out app I've tried. But I thoroughly enjoy it! It's simple, easy to use, it has 3 different goal oriented work out programs to choose from and the exercises feel appropriate for the different work out programs. The explanations/examples of each exercise is great and helpful. And there are some easy to use and helpful features as well. I haven't explored all the features yet tho. But I recommend giving it a try!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a lovely review. We appreciate your kind words and will keep improving our app to bring you a better experience. For any other issues, please feel free to contact us via " Me -> Feedback".We are always happy to hear from you!üòä

scraped_reviews.content: This company seems to have been following me for at least 7 years give or take a month, and it makes me nervous. SHOWS up in "You might also like:" when it's not even close to the search of my interests. OK so what I downloaded it once way long time ago. How is it finding me on all devices and all accounts? FOR REALS am I the only one seeing this every time like this. "Like here's what you searched but you might also want to do 50 push ups today." ... ... dude.

I haven't tried very many free abdominal apps because, once I found this one, I didn't bother looking any further. For the value I get out of it, the ads don't bother me one bit. It's surprisingly customizable for a free app, and it does everything I need it to do, and more. Whenever I remember to use it regularly, I see noticeable improvements, so what more could you really ask for?

Well this is great app, easy to use, with examples for every exercise and showing also the muscles this particular exercise targeting, as long you will keep a constant effort believe me you will see results. I dropped from 183.2 to 171.2 in a month doing just this app 15 minutes tops a day. Good luck, you all worth it to look and feel good. Peace ‚úåÔ∏è oh and by the way its free.

What happens with this application would be the fact that they do not give you the option to show your age and/or height, having said this we take into account that it is a fundamental factor for the person who exercises and having results based in its parameters. The second thing is that it is not very likely that you will have notable results in a month, it should take you more time, it is a very short period. The third thing would be that they show healthy habits (including diets).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback. We will take your suggestions seriously and will try our best to make some improvements on these features to bring you a better experience. Would you mind rating us 5 stars(üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü), if you enjoying using our app? For any other issues, please feel free to contact us via Me -> Feedback.‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Seems to be working, and it's free! There are ads that play at the end of your workout on the free version, but the exercises are challenging. I'm on day 17 right now going through the medium intensity program. I curse a lot as I'm doing it, but feel great once it's done. Your mileage may vary, but I definitely think this can give me a much tighter core in 30 days.

There are very few apps that I can call excellent. Excellent in principle, philosophy, and ethical as well. It actually works. The workouts can be tailored. The more consistent you work is, the less ads you recieve. It's motivating. Takes only a day or 2 for me to see measurable progress, and you can alter the difficulty between workouts to tailor the system to you body's ability to recover or grow muscle. Fantastic app. I used it years ago, and got abs. I'm using it now to get them again.

This app is awesome where I can open it up the app and do my workout anywhere. I use this when I don't have an ab work planned out. I strongly recommend to do your own workouts as well as eating healthy and so on. The only th ing I worry about is people be discourage by not having results right away. Just keep going, starting is the easy part but perseverance is key. And if your doing this to get girls, find one that cares about who you not what you look like, it is not worth it.

This app is wonderful. It's free, which is wonderful right off the bat. And the service it provides doesn't feel like something you'd get from a free app. First off, the work outs are chosen very well, clearly explained, and easily modified to be easier or harder. Second, yes, there are ads, but they are non-intrusive and only about 30 seconds max. Third of all, the progress made is clearly shown. I am doing the intermediate level work out and only after a week in I see progress

Downloaded this app after I reached a plateau with another and it didn't give me the six pack but I did get a 4 pack. The exercises do a lot for the core and the use of the dumbbells is a plus. I'm a mom of 2 & my tummy has never looked better. Definitely eat clean and workout daily and you will see results. My only deterrent is the inability to add on to the times for certain things like the plank. I'll still give it 5 stars because I'm able to amp up my workouts with different weights.

So, kinda gushing about the company's apps all together on this one. These are amazing workout programmes. Hands down. A little bit of skill issue on my part, on some beginner workouts, but that's just my range of motion. I like how fit I am after only a few months into some of their programmes. I do about two-three workouts a day, and it's just the bee's knees. Where's my bodybuilding gang at?

Best workout app I ever used. Perfect in every way. Animations of exercise are easy to follow, coaching tips (which can be turned off after learning the ins and outs of each exercise) helped me learn where I was doing an exercise wrong. Reminders are nice. Weight tracking is great as well. I already downloaded splits in 30 days from the people that make this app and will download more in the future. Thanks!!!!

Great app! I really like how to app gives you detail instructions for each exercise, with an animated video and an instructional video to make sure I'm doing it correctly. It gives you breaks in between each exercise and you choose how long you want to catch your breath before continuing. With a lot of exercise apps, I have to follow along, I fall behind, I feel like I'm doing the exercises wrong. But with this you do it at your own pace. Love it!

This app is excellent. #1 it's free #2 ads are skipable #3 workouts are adjustable, so you can make them easier or harder continuesly.. do all three levels then start over making them harder and harder to do just keep doing it for ever. Excellent way to keep track of workouts and weight, reminders and all. I would recommend this app, just do it stick with it and you will be happy with the results.

Ad supported ab workout app. Ads typically play after working out, which is minor irritation, and can be removed for $5. The app itself is pretty good: it guides you through a series of exercises that take about ten minutes per day. A robotic voice gives tips like "keep your shoulders on the ground." I'm a week in, so I haven't achieved rock hard abs yet, but so far I'm feeling pretty good. Recommend trying!

I have this app on a separate "Fitness Phone" & this app & Pro Gym Workout are vital to my fitness goals. I was 300lbs(136 kilos)& was just getting older & fatter,that was barely a month ago from this date(05-18-19). Since then I've lost 10lbs(4.5 kilos)& continuing to improve. I also changed my diet to a much healthier option. If your reading this & you're struggling with the way you look & feel,just know it's possible to change,it's not easy but I promise it's worth it. YOU HAVE TO WANT IT!!

Great workout that doesn't require equipment and has instructional videos available for each exercise. It's perfect to squeeze in to a short ten-minute time slot during the day. I really appreciate the variety on each day's exercises so they don't get boring, and the subtle scale-up. And if the scaling is too subtle, you have the option to increase (or decrease) the difficulty each day.

With easy to follow instructions, built in routine planning, and an flexible exercises (adding weights, more routines, etc.), this app is amazing. I downloaded it on a wim because I've been stuck on the last 30 pounds of my weight loss (70 pounds so far), and after the first workout I know this will get me all the way. Thank you for the amazing app!

title: Klook: Travel & Activities
description:
Download the Klook travel app to find deals for planning trips and booking hotel accommodation, local activities, car rentals, day tours and more best things to do anytime, anywhere.

A World of Possibilities
There are hundreds and thousands of activities across the world waiting for you on Klook. From sightseeing trips and hotel bookings to immersive cultural experiences, we‚Äôre here to guide you to your world of joy.

Trusted & Top-rated Activities
Explore handpicked experiences and get local insights for hundreds of destinations. Museums in Singapore? Tour packages in South Korea? Or some family attractions nearby? When you're on Klook, you're seeing the best of every place in your hands.

Experiences Made Easy
We make e-booking fast with instant confirmation and skip-the-line tickets on selected attractions. Whether it‚Äôs chasing waves on a Phuket vacation package, tasting wine in Melbourne or finding out what‚Äôs fun for the weekend in your area, you're just a few taps away from booking whatever makes you happy.

Unlock Platinum on Klook Rewards for Exclusive Perks
- Earn up to 5X more KlookCash 
- Get up to US$250 in coupons
- Skip the line for priority customer support 
- Unlock free eSIM and coupons for Travel Essentials

You can elevate your Klook experience to Platinum when you spend US$1,500 as a Klook Gold member.

And a Whole Lot More
- Budgeting when travelling? Use Klook-exclusive promo codes to save on the best deals
- Redeem your tickets and e-vouchers or download them for easy offline access
- Save your bucket-list holiday ideas to your wishlist and book later
- Choose from trains, buses, carsÔºå and even ferries to get around
- Get movie and event ticket discounts and bundles

Find us and say hello!
- Official website: www.klook.com
- Facebook: @klookglobal
- Twitter: @klooktravel
- Instagram: @klooktravel

Got ideas for us? Let us know at appfeedback@klook.com. Thanks bestie.

summary: Discover and book tours, attractions, tickets, trains and car rentals worldwide

scraped_reviews.content: Used this for a trip to Cambodia. BIG MISTAKE. No contact information. Some features of the app doesn't work (eg, Ask KLOOK) Lack of customer service. Klook doesn't run the tours. Cannot cancel once booked (they made it impossible to cancel). STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP. if you are trying to book a tour, go to the source directly. KLOOK is just a third party trying to rip off your hard earned money. DON'T GET FOOLED BY THEIR REPLY TO MY REVIEW. PROBABLY COPYING AND PASTING. And DON'T GIVE ME SOME LINK TO CONTACT CUSTOMER SERVICE. THE INFORMATION SHOULD HAVE BEEN ON THE VOUCHER IN THE FIRST PLACE.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for choosing Klook and leaving us a review. We are sorry to hear about the trouble of your experience. We are more than happy to assist you with more booking details provided. Please contact us by submitting the following form: https://www.klook.com/faq?ask_klook We will have a customer service staff to assist you as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Having a terrible experience booking tickets to a limited express train. I booked more than an hour in advance and paid but the confirmation hasn't arrived even though the payment is through. The train is almost here and we are still waiting. title: Free Fire
description:
Welcome to Flame Arena, where thrilling survival challenges await. As the fires of battle ignite once more, will your squad outlast the rest and claim the trophy of glory?

[Flame Arena]
Each team enters with a banner. Fallen teams see their banners reduced to ashes, while victors keep theirs flying high. Stay alert as the exclusive arena commentary delivers real-time callouts on eliminations and special events.

[Flame Zone]
As the match heats up, the Safe Zone transforms into a blazing ring of fire, with a fiery trophy burning bright in the sky. Special flame weapons will drop during battles. They come with boosted stats and fiery area damage, making them true game changers in the Flame Arena.

[Player Card]
Every fight matters. Your performance builds your Player Value. During the Flame Arena event, create your own player card, unlock vibrant designs, and make sure your name is remembered.

Free Fire is a world-famous survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in the wild, or become invisible by proning under grass or rifts. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive and answer the call of duty.

Free Fire, Battle In Style!

[Survival shooter in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for legendary airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Fast and Lite gameplay - Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will you go beyond the call of duty and be the one under the shining lite?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Answer the call of duty and lead your friends to victory and be the last team standing at the apex.

[Clash Squad]
A fast paced 4v4 game mode! Manage your economy, purchase weapons, and defeat the enemy squad!

[Realistic and smooth graphics]

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Flame Arena, where thrilling survival challenges await. As the fires of battle ignite once more, will your squad outlast the rest and claim the trophy of glory?

[Flame Arena]
Each team enters with a banner. Fallen teams see their banners reduced to ashes, while victors keep theirs flying high. Stay alert as the exclusive arena commentary delivers real-time callouts on eliminations and special events.

[Flame Zone]
As the match heats up, the Safe Zone transforms into a blazing ring of fire, with a fiery trophy burning bright in the sky. Special flame weapons will drop during battles. They come with boosted stats and fiery area damage, making them true game changers in the Flame Arena.

[Player Card]
Every fight matters. Your performance builds your Player Value. During the Flame Arena event, create your own player card, unlock vibrant designs, and make sure your name is remembered.

Free Fire is a world-famous survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in the wild, or become invisible by proning under grass or rifts. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive and answer the call of duty.

Free Fire, Battle In Style!

[Survival shooter in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for legendary airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Fast and Lite gameplay - Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will you go beyond the call of duty and be the one under the shining lite?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Answer the call of duty and lead your friends to victory and be the last team standing at the apex.

[Clash Squad]
A fast paced 4v4 game mode! Manage your economy, purchase weapons, and defeat the enemy squad!

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the optimum survival experience you will find on mobile to help you immortalize your name among the legends.

[Contact us]
Customer Service: https://ffsupport.garena.com/hc/en-us
summary: 10-minutes Survival Shooter!

scraped_reviews.content: Free Fire is a really fun and addictive battle royale game. The matches are fast, the graphics run smooth, and playing with friends is always exciting. I love the characters, skills, and updates that keep it fresh. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the best skins and bundles are too expensive‚Äîyou need diamonds and usually have to top up with real money. If there were more free diamond giveaways, it would easily be 5 stars!

HOWEVER, I just wish there was a way to remove pets if you equip them, it's soo annoying when I accidentally equip a pet and have to use my next character slot just to have my character how it was before and we only have limited access to 5 character slots. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your message. You can access every first lesson of every course in every language for free. Some options can get to 80 free lessons. You would only require a subscription for full access. We hope this information helps, kind regards and Happy Learning! üòå

scraped_reviews.content: It's great if you like learning in more of a linear, formal way, it's very similar to how I was taught in school (to learn the basics and build on that.) It's a little boring in its template tho. I use Duolingo too and it sucks me in because it's like a game, but it seems to focus on immersion learning with few to no explainations. If you want a school-like learning experience, Babble is the better option.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Abby, thank you for your feedback! We are glad that our app meets your expectations. Happy learning!

scraped_reviews.content: I like being able to choose between different methods when practicing vocabulary - for example, I'm able to focus on pronunciation, if I want. This app's voice recognition, however, needs work. It sometimes marks me incorrect when I pronounce words correctly, and has also marked me correct when I make mistakes. Simpler graphics are more appealing, and Babbel does list the available languages for buyers to check before buying. If Japanese and Mandarin are in production, I look forward to those.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for taking the time to send us your feedback. We are constantly working to improve our user experience, and appreciate your taking the time to send us your comments. We will be taking a closer look at the audio feature. Feel free to post your suggestions for improvement on our Wishboard: wishboard.babbel.com üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: It would've been an excellent game for learning Spanish, but if you arent able to pay for it when it surprises you that you need to in order to continue after about two minutes in, then you shouldn't bother downloading it. If you are able, then go for it its worth it. I downloaded something very similar as far as, fun and easy to learn fast , for free called speak tribe or something. Good luck!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, we appreciate your feedback. Course fees cover things like web hosting, learning material, and resources for our developers to make Babbel even better. You can access the first lessons of every course, in every language; some of them can offer up to 80 free lessons. Thank you for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: Speech recognition is awful. I'd say it was only on my device (Pixel 7a) but after reading the other reviews it seems more widespread than that. Really doesn't help that I have to press the microphone between 2 and 6 times to get it to register (which really doesn't help with the frustration of trying to get it to hear me). Unfortunately I bought a year so I just had to disable speaking exercises so I could move on without that experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we need to investigate this situation. Could you please send us a message to support@babbel.com (mailto:support@babbel.com) with the email address linked to your Babbel account? Once we have this information, we will be able to assist you further. Thank you for getting in touch.

scraped_reviews.content: Thought it was going to be a great app but then I realized you have to pay $89 to get past the FIRST 2 min lesson. I mean, I knew there would be a paid option (which I may have decided to purchase after trying out the app) but I definitely didn't think the whole thing would be restricted unless you immediately pay for it. DuoLingo is a MUCH better app. Same type of lessons but you can use it for free. You just have to watch ads after every lesson.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Remmi, we appreciate your feedback. You can access the first lessons of every course, in every language; some of them can offer up to 80 free lessons. Course fees cover things like web hosting, learning material, and resources for our developers to make Babbel even better. Thank you for your understanding.

title: Crisis Action: 7th Anniversary
description:
Join in 7th Anniversary events to get free weapons now! Come back to enjoy the new version, brave the new dawn!

========================
Visit our official site at: http://casa.herogame.com
Like us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/crisisaction
Subscribe our YouTube at:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmGOjkQdPiEgGeKDpUPcjDw
Customer Service Email: crisisactionsa@herogame.com.tw
========================
„ÄÄ
‚Äî‚Äî Game Features ‚Äî‚Äî
‚ñº 7th Anniversary Weapons Online
7th Anniversary series weapons come with cool shape and strong firepower. No matter use it in fight or collect as souvenir, login to get one now!
„ÄÄ
‚ñº New Mode 
Two new modes - Air raid & Gravity Zero, fly the helicopter or fight without gravity. Try the totally different FPS!
„ÄÄ
‚ñº S13 of the Rank Starts
Brand new season rank rewards have been updated, fight for the highest glory and win the great weapon back!

‚ñº 7th Anniversary Events Published
Series events have been published both in the game and the special event page. Join the events to get rewards!

‚Äî‚Äî The Gameplay ‚Äî‚Äî

‚ÄªTactic mode: Defeat enemies and release special tactic skills to fight„ÄÄ
‚ÄªDoodle fight mode: Capturing fields by spraying paint, enjoy an offbeat and funny FPS!
‚ÄªDragon strike mode: Protect base, defeat the mechanical dragon
‚ÄªWolfwere mode: Using limited weapons to beat the player who is affected by wolvewere virus
‚ÄªMech mode: Drive the powerful mech and fire at the enemy!
‚ÄªPVE challenge mode: Various gameplays and much more fun to conquer the difficult hell.
‚ÄªBio parkour mode: Hurry up! Chasing zombies, or escaping from the hunters.
‚ÄªRanked match: Variety of guns and maps for you to choose to be No.1.
‚ÄªArena mode: Either fight in teams or Solo, skills are required!
‚ÄªLeisure mode: Zero Gravity, Hide& Seek, and Cartoon Hero. Play for fun!
„ÄÄ
It's the best moment to join in Crisis Action, download for FREE to play in the best FPS Game right now!„ÄÄ
Note: Crisis Action is free to play, though some ingame items can also be purchased for real money.
„ÄÄ
‚Äî‚Äî About Hero Entertainment ‚Äî‚Äî
„ÄÄ
HERO Entertainment was founded in 2015, and is aimed at building a world-leading interactive entertainment brand. Based on global perspective and the era of mobile Internet, HERO devotes itself into providing high-quality mobile games to domestic and overseas users. HERO has published many preeminent mobile MOBA games including Crisis Action, Shinsangokushi, Extraordinary Ones, Utopia: Origin, Hopeless Land.
„ÄÄ
Any business cooperation, please feel free to contact: herogame@yingxiong.com

title: Photo Studio PRO
description:
Photo Studio is a powerful multifunctional photo editing application for photographers of any level. It contains the vast editing kit of tools for basic and advanced retouching of your photos. Make each your shot a perfect complete art-work using a wide range of effects, filters, text editing and color enhancement tools and a lot of other ready-to-use features.

Main features:

1. More than 200 unique filters, amazing special effects, a big collection of picture-in-picture effects, rich set of various frames for any event of your life, huge amount of stickers, textures, shapes and correction tools ‚Äì lighting tune, color correction, sharpening, lens boost, tilt shift, blur and more.

2. Use manual correction tools to highlight, fix or improve any part or object on your photo. Use mask correction tool to apply filters, effects or tune your photo selectively.

3. Collage editor allows to combine several photos into amazingly looking photo collages with a wide variety of adjustable frames, shapes, customizable backgrounds, templates and stickers.

4. Magic tools comprising the following outstanding features:  Blend feature for combining of two images together using a big collection of masks, backgrounds and blend modes; Color Splash is aimed to highlight objects on a photo; Clone stamp is intended to copy objects, change or erase a background; Shapes editor helps to combine photos with multiple variations of shapes, textures and backgrounds. 

5. Impressive text editing tool is designed for creation of nice-looking messages on your photos with rich collection of customizable fonts, color, textures and shapes.

6. About 50 additional content packages expanding the photo editing process with new effects, frames, textures, fonts and templates. Our team's constantly working hard to implement new stunning features to gain the #1 photo editor title. 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kvadgroup/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/kvadgroup
Twitter: http://twitter.com/kvadgroup
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMfsIMOqr-FKZnb6yQAltIA/videos

scraped_reviews.content: I bought the application a while back after test driving it for a couple of weeks. I used it through SEVERAL photo edit projects, all of which exceeded my expectations by leaps and bounds. Several fonts to choose from, as well as having the ability to resize the letters/phrases to size of choice. App has user friendly editing. Use the layer editor to move throughout your changes step by step. You can send your photo to any destination, be it a file on the phone or out in a cloud.

Not the most user-friendly editor, but it has some cool features. Challenge yourself to learn how to use this app. If you do, you'll appreciate some of the great tools it has. For example, I love the background eraser tool, once I figured out how it works, it's the best I've ever seen for cropping pets, probably for hair of any type. I give 4 ‚òÜ's because a few changes could make a better user experience. It might be as easy as adding a ? shortcut to help for tool functions and use descriptions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôd really appreciate it if you could write to our support team at support@kvadgroup.com with more details about what you find not user-friendly and what changes you think could help. Your input can help us improve the app for everyone!

I haven't had any forced ads & I really hope they never add them. it would end my loyalty.
