title: Perplexity - Ask Anything
description:
Perplexity‚ÄîWhere Knowledge Begins. The answers you need‚Äîright at your finger tips.

Cut through the clutter and get straight to credible, up-to-date answers. This free app syncs across devices and leverages the power of the top AI models from OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, and more. 

Features:

¬∑ Perplexity Pro Search: Guided AI search for deeper exploration.

¬∑ Thread Follow-Up: Keep the conversation going for a deeper understanding.

¬∑ Voice: Instant, up-to-date answers whether you type or say it. 

¬∑ Trust Built In: Cited sources for every answer.

¬∑ Discover: Learn new things from the community.

¬∑ Your Library: More than search history, it's a curation of your discoveries.

Download Perplexity now and continue your journey to better knowledge and understanding.
descriptionHTML:
Perplexity‚ÄîWhere Knowledge Begins. The answers you need‚Äîright at your finger tips.

Cut through the clutter and get straight to credible, up-to-date answers. This free app syncs across devices and leverages the power of the top AI models from OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, and more.

Features:

¬∑ Perplexity Pro Search: Guided AI search for deeper exploration.

¬∑ Thread Follow-Up: Keep the conversation going for a deeper understanding.

¬∑ Voice: Instant, up-to-date answers whether you type or say it.

¬∑ Trust Built In: Cited sources for every answer.

¬∑ Discover: Learn new things from the community.

¬∑ Your Library: More than search history, it's a curation of your discoveries.

Download Perplexity now and continue your journey to better knowledge and understanding.
summary: Get trusted answers to any question

scraped_reviews.content: This app, and the people behind it, are excellent. But I'm deleting it, for 2 reasons: the only Pro feature I need is no ads, but that's not an option; its unusual, annoying login process: instead of e-mail/password, it's e-mail/one-time code e-mailed to you. Since I can't always access my e-mail, I can't always use the app. I've asked for a one-time 'ad-free' fee, and plan to ask for alternate methods of receiving your code, e.g., text or phone call. I'll reinstall if these changes are made.

By far the best AI app! I do promote the monthly pro version. Why 4 stars: 1. You either have to choose to use the voice to voice or text chat to text chat, you cant chat and send attachments and then decide to go to voice, they dont recognize each other. Yes, all your threads are saved. 2. My decrease of a start goes to the site not having an option to remember conversations. I hope this will become an option later. It is frustrating to repeat yourself when logging back in for whatever reason.

Perplexity has become one of those rare apps that slips so smoothly into my daily routine that I forget there was ever a time without it. It feels less like a search engine and more like a thinking companion ‚Äî fast, clear, and surprisingly human in the way it delivers information. My main use right now is news research. Perplexity cuts straight through the chaos of the modern internet ‚Äî the paywalls, the clickbait, the overloaded headlines.

Nice trick to bait people into using your app, then terminating pro under the small print in the terms. You'll likely lose much more potential income from users who would have turned into paying customers in a year than if you'd have just taken the hit and left pro active. This way, you likely drove away 90%+ of potential customers. Smart move! It's a shame, too, how quickly a business decision takes a 4-5 star app to 1.

Great ai but some simple tasks are missed completely. Like a timer. It didn't start a timer, it counted down by itself, and failed. It also seems that the access ain't working, could be from my end though I guess but it has access to everything but can't make an entry in my calendars. It also confuses the language from time to time. I ask something in English and it responds in French. If these minor things are being fixed it's a solid 5 star.

The concept of combining several LLM model is good, and I do like the pro version pretty much since you get a lot more out of it. However, the mobile app is so wonky that changing apps will tell u to retry your prompt when it had already been processed. They needa fix all these small UI issues to make the user experience much smoother... Also, the AI's reliance on unfiltered online sources, especially for sensitive topics like stock information, introduces a high degree of noise, or bad data.

Definitely one of the best apps I've ever used it's an app I use constantly throughout the day throughout the week. I would say that for most things that I'm looking for whether it be a quick factual answer whether it be a more in-depth conversation about something particularly if it's fact-based or information-based, I'm much more apt to go to perplexity than to search Google.

This app is useful and convenient enough to use just that when using it in my mobile phone if the answers are long like a calculation, it doesn't fit into the display of my phone and I can only see half of it and the other half of my answer doesn't appears in the screen. And I can't utilise the auto rotate function of my phone to view the answer in landscape mode either. Please fix this.

This is probably the best app I have ever used for just finding the answers to the question I have when I don't really know how to phrase the question. The best part is that the more questions you ask in the thread the more context there is for both you and Perplexity. I would sign up for the pay version if it was about half the price. I wish they would find a way to make it sponsored so they could bring the price of the full version down to zero. I'm used to seeing ads anyway...

I've honestly been using this AI for a while now, especially with helping me in my research studies, but is there a way that it is possible to switch account faster? As that's how I try to seperate my school work searches over my free time searches, I'd think it be more organized if we're able to quick swap between accounts. Other than that, this is an amazing app!

Excellent. Love the 3 tiers of answers, and the ability to ask follow-up questions. Plus, the app itself is very user-friendly. If I want to see more resources from a particular perspective, it will give me more articles and other resources within seconds. It was able to give me sooo much information on such specific topics (like the doctrinal views of specific early Church Fathers, for example), I'm super impressed!

Wow! Once you go the Perplexity way, you can't go back. Imagine having "exact" answers provided for you rather than just links to approximate websites... Imagine a search engine/AI with the ability to extract the actual information you need from all the fluff and collate it into an answer you can use... including references for each answer... behold = Perplexity

The platform demonstrates exceptional performance, offering a user-friendly experience. Its comprehensive and detailed responses to a wide range of inquiries have significantly enhanced my workflow, surpassing previous experiences with platforms like Google and OpenAI. The intuitive design and intelligent functionality are highly commendable.

Middling app performance. The desktop app does better at retrieving chats, while the mobile app simply collapses to "Something went wrong, please try again later" and refuses to load old threads you badly need to relook. Also there's no way you can buy individual queries as add-ons when your regular plan limit is reached. Won't pay $20/month for this service. I'm in simply because it's bundled free with Airtel. Also, you're crazy if you think people will spend $2400/year for the max upgrade.

The max model is a lot of hot air. It is not worth the high price. It is not smart at all. it gives really bad debugs, goes in circles, assumes too much, does not read your instructions, avoids responsibility, tends to ruin your work when you are about to finish it as if it knows and wants to keep you working. Worse thing is that it gives up and tells you to use a real developer after wasting your time. not recommended at all

I have discovered a serious problem with Perplexity AI. When I write a long/broad prompt in Mobile, it's harder to continue writing, every time I write a letter every time it's back/go to the top of the prompt... I have cleared cash,uninstalled and re-installed the app, logged in again and tried out many other methods to solve it but it's not solved... I think it's a bug... So Please solve it.

No voice activation (or "wake word"), and the app doesn't preserve any voice settings (like custom speed or accent) between sessions. It also doesn't matter how many times you tell it to speak more slowly, it gradually speeds up again. The unnecessarily stressful high speed responses are offputting. It just seems to get faster and faster the longer you talk to it.

So many minor mistakes one after the other. I simply asked to create specific formula and instead of doing that, it gave me a whole lenghtly dictionary of explanations that I did not asked. and then it bundled stuff, which is incorrect, I Asked to fixed that mistake and Perplexity AI instead of fixing it own mistakes, it gave me again, a length explanations that I did not asked. I have to constantly request AI Perplexity to fix its own minor mistakes, but failed to comply commands.

So, i got the so called Pro Version from Airtel. I have been using Claude AI and Chat GPT. I was sure to support our Indian Version of AI. As expected, it's still needs more training and has no ability to be useful. Especially when it comes to AI like Claude and even deepseek. I am sorry, I can't use it anymore. it's useful for kids to make homework only.

Extremely frustrating to use, I got the paid version for free from airtel and it's of no use. It no longer follows instructions. I use it for suggestions for myself and stories to read. Today I have specifically aksed it multiple times to let the scene breath and not fade out, close the scene, summarize, time jump, or give closing reflections. And it didn't follow instructions. I will cancel my subscription.

I recently acquired a premium account with them. The first time I've attempted to use it and they are asking for me to log in again and I require a code sent to my email to login. I've entered my email address and yet haven't received an email with the code. So I can't login to use the premium feature, so for me this is the bog standard basic AI at a premium cost. DO NOT BOTHER. I wish I could give zero stars.

Perplexity AI totally changed my research game! üöÄ Answers arrive in seconds, every claim is backed by clickable sources, and the summaries are crisp enough for quick decisions. The real‚Äëtime web search feels like having a super‚Äësmart assistant that never misses a beat. Highly recommend for students, professionals, and curious minds!

Awesome app for quick searches, but also for extensive research or troubleshooting. It's my main search engine now. I also love that it has almost no ads (they are implementing sponsored follow-up questions right now). It would be awesome though if i was able to use it as my device assistant app. Edit: THEY LISTENED, YAAAAAAYYYYYY!!! Now, all we need it to be able to do is to change settings. And a search bar for the discover page would also be super important. Edit 2: They listened again!

they're going downhill. it's not the same anymore, and I've been a pro user for a while. They're having internal system issues, or they're purposely redirecting tasks to different LLMs instead of whats selected. upsetting, but I'm canceling and looking at alternatives.

Nothing wrong with it really, it's just not for me. However, one important thing many developers overlook is how the app function when connected to a Bluetooth keyboard. Perplexity app doesn't recognize enter key so I have to manually move my hand from the keyboard to the screen and hit send button. I'm pretty sure it's an easy fix for a team who made Perplexity. I just thought it's worth mentioning. *Edit: It's been 5 months, still not able to send the msg by hitting the enter key.

What can I say, I wasn't really understanding the hype about this app. I would always see adverts about it but decided to stick to ChatGPT. And then I later had enough of ChatGPT because it wasn't free and you had a limited amount of uploads (photos) to ask about. Perplexity is very helpful, you can do the needful for free, and it's like ChatGPT but more cheaper. I definitely recommend it if you just want straightforward answers on a daily basis. So this app is about 4.8 stars

With the new version, the threads are now difficult to access, by putting it to a top left button (rather than in bottom for fast users). The navigation was much better in the old version, where it was easy to switch to threads. Please bring it back

It's a good search engine with exceptional summary capabilities. If that's all you're after, godspeed. It is free of the "guardrails" that can make chatGPT results useless after its mid-2025 update, but it also can't do much with the results or even grasp nuances in your queries. So it is not a substitute for Claude or ChatGTP if you want to work with results in any way, and you may still have to wade through paragraphs of general or vague word vomit to get what you're looking for.

Love this app!! For the price, this is the best AI app out there. It has at least 4 different AI models at any time. And it shows it's work better than any other AI app. I have even told it never to use Wikipedia (because it's not a source) and it has rarely used it since. Well done developers!!

If I could give less than one star, I would. I downloaded this because I wanted to do the Text-to-speech feature for free. That is what it said, and then I get a paywall prompt every time I try to access the free Text-to-speech. This is so messed up. I hate this app. Delete immediately. No one download this, not recommended.

worst ai ever used . i had airtel perplexity pro . Even nit satisfied with responses. It needs to improve a lot more , it can't even interpret a single thing clearly given . Even can't read textual or pdfs properly , can't solve maths properly . clearly waste of time,network,money(if you buy pro). i would prefer not to buy pro .

Update: I'm still using Perplexity and it's the only AI that can make me cuss out of frustration! I use it for translation purposes and it's always a 50/50 gamble. There'll be times where I ask it to change the wording for certain sentences and it'll revise the sentence into whatever it wants. There are other times where I ask it to change the formality and it'll make the revision but also make other unnecessary, unasked for changes. Using this app is always a gamble and I usually end up raging.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Eloy, sorry the translation and responses have gotten worse for you. Please email support@perplexity.ai or chat at pplx.ai/discord with examples so we can investigate.

scraped_reviews.content: even with pro version, perplexity is becoming unusable. it has started glitching out a lot of the time. it will regurgitate information I didn't ask for, and refuse to stop talking when I ask it to. ask it a very simple question and it gives you 10 paragraphs in response. while it is generating an answer there is a stop button to stop that process but this seems to do absolutely nothing which is quite frustrating because you just have to wait for it to get done.

EDIT: THIS ISSUE IS FIXED. Original review: I pay for Perplexity. Yet the majority of the time when I click on the app and type something, there is no response or it says "retry". Likewise, the Discovery tab is often just a scrolling black screen. I presume they're overloaded, because when it works it's great. EDIT: I've switched to using the progressive web app (i.e. Chrome three dot menu, then "Add to Home Screen"). It works much better than this app.

Using this app as an assistant is just a pain in the back. A Pro user: 1- It starts replying while I am still talking, literally interrupting me with something that I did not ask for, or even worse, asking me for clarification. 2- It always takes a screenshot when summoned, and most of the time, my question is not related to whatever is on the screen. 3- There is no way to continue your audio conversation on the main app. Please work on your app, folks!

I had to uninstall this because it uses a very high amount of data, I think for the Discovery News images: 500 megs of data a day! 10 gigs a month! Definitely just stick with the browser version, it's way better. Perplexity has been completely reduced in power all the other models you could use have been removed (no more Claude, 03, deepseek, etc); it relies way too much on reddit posts!

Great App, It delivers easy to understand responses to multi layered questions every time. It even delivers additional information related to the questions that I didn't even think to ask. It has been worth even star so far, for the short time that I have been using it.

As of November 2025, Perplexity is the most helpful and accurate (as in it actually does what it's told) Llm model AI I've used. It's not perfect, or even good at everything; but it does the things I want it to do very well, with minimal hallucinations or other errors. Great at assisting with research and being a sounding board/ logical validator. Not so good at: Creativity related subjects. Art and the like. That said it has been an excellent helper in regards to word selection assistanceüëç

Perplexity is far better than Chrome and other browsers, because it has a unique approach to problem.One thing i also wants to praise ,is your comet and perplexity layout ,highly good for students and researcher.And I wants to mention a problem related to comet desktop based version that , students and researcher spends more time on internet to study thing and paper ,journals so,please make your pdf view in comet different from other browsers ,atleast we should have underline capabilities.

Reply to the gentleman who loves Perplexity Pro but will and or can't pay the price. I too was there but fortunately as an added bonus through my mobile service carrier I was given 1 year free and cannot tell you how much this Artificial Intelligence has helped me. Not only for unanswered questions I may have had but mentally. I will go so far as to say saved my life. I have tried others only to be deceived " Good things are not cheap and cheap things are not good. "

the ai has its typical issues that most ai's struggle with but I enjoy it a little more compared to most. the main reason for my 3 stars is this new issue where when I click on the text bar to type a new prompt, it somehow goes past the text bar and clicks on one of those borderline useless "suggested prompts" please fix this

Actually it's very good. There's good answers and it gives you true and safe informations about any theme, it also can do anything and if you ask correctly, it can do anything for ya. The only problem I'd and this one made me give 4 stars. Was the problem with the voice message, since it repeats the same text twice in a text and it doesn't make sense.

PERPLEXITY IS THE VERY BEST BY FAR! Where Google, Copilot, chatgtp, and others struggle for answers or don't even recognize a plain talk query, Perplexity gets it dead right, EVERY TIME! The answers are expansive, accurate, in plain talk, or as detailed as you need, all sources footnoted, to follow up as you wish. It even reads my mind!! With follow up questions I was thinking to clarify it all. ALL INSANELY FREE! & NO ADS!! üí• MUCH better, use instead of Google Assistant. JUST GET IT! ‚ù§Ô∏è

there's a minor problem with the app design... the suggested follow up questions/prompts that you can tap and automatically send, are too big and close to other buttons and i accidentally touched the ready to send prompts a few times so maybe a little spacing or changing the size would be nice other than that great app and AI specially as an assistant for working on projects.

I'm trying to use your image generator to make some adult comic book hero's . But the app seriously has no choice parental restrictions for everyone I think it needs to have an option to allow explicit content for adults like most things out there do i will definitely not be subscribing after my free trial is over I thought ai could do anything but I guess it has limitations I'm sure it's just because of its programmers are close minded about adult content they had a sheltered life lol

Im just getting started with it but so far so good. Im using the free version now but may upgrade to pro for more detailed assistance. Im starting a project on 10-1-25 so I'll come back and update if I need to upgrade to pro version. Free version seems to give accurate answers and help and I'm going in now to see if it's capable of helping me create a logo.

The app is very straight forward and simple to use. I'm omw of the people who hates using mobile for most of the Internet but Perplexity has really nailed down the experience. The answers from the AI are always well sourced and on topic which is why it is my go to AI if my question is about topics where I expect there to be solid web results.

First it was fine but then it started to not recognise the words I am speaking in the speaker and I had to write everything, big questions to it. It said "Oh here, let me give u solution" but then I had to type "?" then it would give solution, Processing is really slow. It is fast but VERY inaccurate. I calculated a math problem 4 times because it showed different answer each time. I am extremely disappointed in the service. It deserves to be banned. Thanku.

Worse than Google. This app cannot show any images or thumbnails from websites to be able to let you narrow down your search. It can not give you links to active websites instead, it gives you links to websites that are no longer functional, for example, I'm trying to search for a replacement lens for my light Pole by my driveway. It keeps giving me results for pendant or wall mount lights, not a pole light.

It seems one of the best AI search assistant. Great for educational researches, speak functions, organizing results in collections. The negative: It does not automatically rename the searches with keyword based titles. Not so good for price comparison. Most free features are limited. BAD FOR: Calculations FEATURES REQUEST: Please consider adding these features - conversations collapse (like Gmail).

title: Garmin Connect‚Ñ¢
description:
The Garmin Connect‚Ñ¢ app is your one-stop source for health and fitness data. Whether you‚Äôre training for a race, keeping active or just staying on top of your health, Garmin Connect provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your goals.

Once you pair your phone (1) with a Forerunner¬Æ, Venu¬Æ, fƒìnix or another compatible Garmin device (2), you can review your tracked activities and health metrics. Plus, you can create workouts, build courses and challenge your friends on the leaderboard. 

With Garmin Connect you can: 
 
- Personalize your home screen, so the most helpful information is instantly visible 
- Analyze your activities with detailed statistics(3)
- Create customized workouts and courses 
- Review trends in health metrics like your heart rate, steps, sleep, stress, menstrual cycle, weight, calories and more
- Earn badges for accomplishments 
- Sync with other apps like MyFitnessPal and Strava 
- Get support for Garmin devices and their features 
 
Learn more about Garmin devices and how they work with the Garmin Connect app at Garmin.com. 

(1)	See compatible devices at Garmin.com/BLE
(2)	See a full list of compatible devices at Garmin.com/devices
(3)	See Garmin.com/ataccuracy

Notes: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. 
Garmin Connect needs SMS permission to allow you to receive and send SMS text messages from your Garmin devices. We also need call log permission to display incoming calls on your devices.
descriptionHTML:
The Garmin Connect‚Ñ¢ app is your one-stop source for health and fitness data. Whether you‚Äôre training for a race, keeping active or just staying on top of your health, Garmin Connect provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your goals.

Once you pair your phone (1) with a Forerunner¬Æ, Venu¬Æ, fƒìnix or another compatible Garmin device (2), you can review your tracked activities and health metrics. Plus, you can create workouts, build courses and challenge your friends on the leaderboard.

With Garmin Connect you can:

- Personalize your home screen, so the most helpful information is instantly visible
- Analyze your activities with detailed statistics(3)
- Create customized workouts and courses
- Review trends in health metrics like your heart rate, steps, sleep, stress, menstrual cycle, weight, calories and more
- Earn badges for accomplishments
- Sync with other apps like MyFitnessPal and Strava
- Get support for Garmin devices and their features

Learn more about Garmin devices and how they work with the Garmin Connect app at Garmin.com.

(1) See compatible devices at Garmin.com/BLE
(2) See a full list of compatible devices at Garmin.com/devices
(3) See Garmin.com/ataccuracy

Notes: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
Garmin Connect needs SMS permission to allow you to receive and send SMS text messages from your Garmin devices. We also need call log permission to display incoming calls on your devices.
summary: beat yesterday.

scraped_reviews.content: Garmin coach is completely unusable. Does not let me change preferences, workouts don't come in, makes me do the benchmark run multiple times and doesn't register I've already done it. Gives me multiple scheduled rest days for no reason. This is all in the course of a week. It is completely inconsistent, doesn't update my planned workouts. I've tried using the website instead but it also doesn't work or shows something completely different than the app. UI is cluttered as well.

Does what its supposed to more or less. However, its constantly waking up and running in the background for seemingly no reason - even with Bluetooth and location services turned off. Furthermore, it seems like every time I turn on my bike computer (every other day or so) im prompted to perform a software update - which is frustrating because I didnt turn the thing on to wait 10 minutes for an update, I turned it on to use it. Do better.

it's alright, neither as terrible or as life changing as some imply. The subscription is pretty useless. I would have considered paying if it allowed me to properly integrate with fitness apps that gave actual training guides and classes, but no, I have to pay other services to shuttle my data onto this platform. Open your ecosystem, integrate with other providers and your app/hardware would be utterly indispensable to me. Now I'm only here until something better comes along.

I love my watch - I use it for health tracking, mainly sleep, oxygen, heart rate, HRV, and stress. Lately, I'm mostly tracking sleep. I think it's extremely annoying that you cannot delete naps in the Garmin Connect app. My Garmin device frequently falsely detects naps. You can edit the nap times, but cannot delete them! It also sometimes doesn't detect sleep properly, and even after editing sleep times, will still give false info about the sleep I got, like saying it was short when it wasn't.

I honestly love the app and the interface tons. But I have a huge problem with the fact that you cannot input any custom BMI values UNLESS you purchase and add the Garmin scale they sell. I paid to have a very accurate BMI measurement taken and I have nowhere to input it now. It's not a technology issue, it's the decision they actively made against us.

The app used to be better before an update that happened a bit ago. Now the layout mimics that of Fitbit, which I personally hate. It's drab, it's not conducive for the user and overall was a bad move. I'm hoping Garmin will either fit it in an update, or give users the option to pick how they want their app set up. If not, I'll find another tracker to use

Overall an excellent app. I've never had a technical issue which is so rare these days. The app works well for tracking and viewing data which is what I really want and need. The app is a weak on giving advice. My biggest advice to users is to take the information as a general guide, not gospel. Look for long term trends, not instantaneous readings or it will drive you crazy. And don't compare to others. Usability is OK. There is a learning curve. A quick search finds most answers.

UPDATE: Worked ok with a few commectivy issues for the past 4 years with Tactix Delta. Now it's back to this irritating connection issue. If I don't wear my watch for a day or if I walk too far from my phone, it loses connection between the app and the phone. But I can't reconnect. I have to go through the process of adding a new device each time. Happens pretty much daily. Sometimes for no reason at all. Was considering getting the new Tactix 8 but if they can't fix this, I'm not paying $1600.

I love my Garmin tracker, it's very capable, sturdy, stylish, and quite accurate! However, the app is very sad! 1) Why is it web-based? if I don't have internet I can't check my data! I wish for the other way around, also for privacy concerns. 2) It's very confusing, there are 3 different places for settings, for example. 3) If I have more than 1 sleep session in a day, the older ones are simply overwritten! (e.g. If I take a nap, or have to wake up then go back to bed) please fix!

I have really enjoyed all the features on the Garmin. I tracks my workouts pretty accurately, sleep and much more. I have really enjoyed having access to a coach on there to help guide my running goals. I love that it keeps track of my cycle too. I work night shift, and the one thing I wish was easier to do was change my sleeping clock/schedule. I forget to do it and my watch will set to sleeping mode in the middle of workouts. Otherwise I'm still a fan of watch and app.

For some reason, the devs decided to use some of the smallest text possible for this app. Despite there being plenty of blank space, almost all of the important numbers are tiny. To make this even worse, in dark mode, they use light gray text on a gray background, further reducing the contrast and readability of the information. There should at least be the option to increase the text size within the app. The app functions well for what it is, but users can barely read the information.

Fitness in many forms! It's very easy to synch your phone with your Garmin product. There is enhanced data available after uploading your activity, and it's great for tracking trends (run time, weight, pulse, etc). It's also neat being able to connect with your Garmin friends, so it adds a little bit of a social network to exercising!

It's complicated at first - I suggest keeping an option to keep a simplified version for people who like to track basic metrics, and a more advanced version for athletes. You have no idea how many times I've had to spend with people switching from more basic ecosystems like Apple or Samsung to Garmin. Beginner enthusiasts will take benefit mostly from the basic features, and later start to dig deeper into endurance scores or hill scores.

Always a solid experience. However, with this recent update, I'm getting a lot more background app activity battery draw, even when my watch is off, and my phone's Bluetooth is off. Every time I go to Tabs to close my recently used apps, Garmin Connect always shows is running in the background, and I have to 'force stop.' I've never had this happen before

The app works ok. Sometimes the option to show heart rate for the body battery doesn't work (it just disappears as an option). And the way it tracks intensity minutes isn't super helpful. I do pilates every day and it never gives me any intensity minutes. Then when I walk it will give me double minutes, for a slow walk. I know it's based on heart rate, but they should change the algorithm for pilates so that it actually looks like you've exercised. It's very demotivating.

Garmin Index Sleep software update has completely broken the device. Other users have been telling them for 2 months now. Still randomly deletes data and misses sleep. They *had* a working product, apparently, which is the crazy part. You'd think they could just revert the Index Sleep-specific changes. Garmin has 3 weeks to fix this before it stays at 1 star permanently and I return the device. To think i was about to buy a watch and chest strap to go with it too. Yikes.

Great app overall to go with my Epix Gen2. The location of some thing isn't always the easiest to find, but that's minor overall. There's a lot to be desired in the strength training parts so I have opted to using a different app for that. I know that type of exercise takes a back seat to running when it comes to garmin so it is what it is until they decide to focus on it more. Here's to hoping.

Forerunner 245 Music disconnects at least once a week for the past two months. Re-add and maybe it'll last a week before it decides to remove it again. Uninstalled, reinstalled, cleared cache, cleared data, rebooted phone and Forerunner. ensured all permissions allowed, set to unoptimized battery so it runs all the time. Nope, no difference. it'll eventually disappear or stop syncing. and every time I re-add it, yet another email thanking me for my purchase. Thought this was a Fitbit thing.

Too clunky. and very irritated that it thinks it should vibrate to ask me to turn off an alarm when I'm struggling to get extra sleep. Like straight up enough to ruin a day... The app itself seems to be riddled with other issues that just don't make sense. Such as: (1) notifications that won't go away; (2) stating "cannot calculate fitness age," but it tells me a number; (3) assuming you lost 0.1lb every time I try to update weight, the input is also messed up there. PLEASE FIX THE APP Y'ALL.

The Garmin Connect app is frustrating and unreliable. Even when I keep the app open, it often says the watch is synced when it's not. Data like weather and barometer readings fail to update, and I constantly have to delete and resync the watch. The app itself feels too plain and ineffective - it doesn't do what it's supposed to reliably. I love the Garmin Instinct watch, but the app makes the overall experience frustrating and inconsistent.

It appears good fitness tracker and more. I really like the Garmin golf feature. I don't trust the sleep score. It indicated deep sleep when I was laying in bed wide awake! It would be really great if it could show blood sugar readings from a Libre 3+ CGM. Also, the solar battery charger doesn't really charger the watch unless it is in the very basic survival power mode.

I like this app except for the Garmin automatic incident alerts. 3 times in the last six months it's gone off, every time a false alarm. The first 2 times I saw it happened, but couldn't manage to use the interface on the watch to cancel it in time. Today I was cycling so didn't even see what had happened until I got home, found it had called my husband and not recorded my ride properly. I've turned the wretched thing off now, but even that was hard to do. Back to the drawing board please.

I'm coming from the old bip watch/zepp app was mostly fantastic, accurate, inexpensive capable and intuitive. This Garmin watch/app is frustrating, inaccurate, expensive and the organization seems convoluted. The sleep tracker is a joke in comparison. I really only switched to get the better battery & i didn't want the oled screen. I'm getting used to some of it but so far I've been very disappointed. I do like the way alarms/timers are done on the Garmin way more. please fix via updates!

Fancy, new update put off the blue was forced when I went in to record some data. In the process I had to go through the steps from the beginning of reconnecting my watch, which is NOT intuitive, the guide steps are not even close to being accurate, and I lost all the tracking data since I guess the update was sent to the app, which was several hours at the end of the day. It took way too much time to go through the steps and figure out how to do it. Now it's done it again, twice in one week

I love my Fenix 7x and using the Connect App. With all the apps and devices, this one has been the best to use. If I had one thing to bump it to a 5 star, it would be to make my created workouts more friendly. The ability to put different workouts into separate folders to find specific workouts would be great. In spite of that one thing, I still highly recommend Garmin for tracking your health and fitness.

I use this app every day to track my health and fitness. The various categories of data are interesting and helpful. My friends and I often compare our different scores, especially sleep. (We're all in our 60s and good sleep is elusive. )Though, at first, I thought the different challenges and badges were gimmicky and unnecessary, now I find them weirdly motivating.

Keeps track of your activities and of some vital signs. CONs: Absolutely useless without Internet access; Doesn't display % charge of your attached smartwatch (how hard can it be to show that as well???); mostly inaccurate when counting floors (my watch claims to use short-term variations of barometric pressure; using accelerometers with GPS would have been far more accurate, given that 10 ft = 1 floor)

Overall. Great visibility. Especially if you want some basic information and not crazy, detailed in depth information. I. Do find scanning through some of the sinking and turning on and off of certain Programs are bit Complicated. But once you figure out where it is you can streamline it and add and delete what you want. I don't need to pay with my watch. Or anything like that. So I like having the app that contract just the important stuff. I want to review in the Evenings.

All of the most useful features of Connect are available for free*, without ads, and that's a huge plus in my book. (*After the initial cost of a Garmin device, of course.) My only real complaints have to do with photos: 1) Max upload of 10 photos per activity seems arbitrary and limiting; 2) Photos are uploaded in incorrect order, always necessitating a reorder after upload.

The Garmin Connect app has been super useful. I love to be able to see all of my metrics after an activity, use LiveTrack, challenge friends, pursue badges, etc. I do wish that Connect had some more options, like the ability to have separate default gear for Bike vs Bike Indoor for instance since I use different bikes for those. I also wish the built-in workouts could be filtered based on available equipment.

I use Garmin Connect almost every day, and I have for a few years now. I cycle a lot and like how it saves routes and stats. There are a few improvements that I wish they would make. One of them is with challenges. I would like to be able to create challenges for myself and not have to add friends. Also, some challenges from the past have been removed, like the monthly tours. Another improvement is being able to group virtual ride mileage (like from Rouvy) with cycling miles.

Nice when it works. Sometimes it doesn't sync the steps with the watch. Trying to troubleshoot made issues worse -- instead of the device (that I wear, laden with data) updating the app, the app wiped out the data from the watch. There's no way to manually adjust the app with the step count from my phone. This kind of thing has been a known issue at Garmin for years (look at the help forums) and it goes unresolved.

I love this app. It has everything from walking, running, swimming, biking, weight lifting. it sets goals for you. or you can set your own goals. you can customize it to your step. it has maps with GPS. it has sharing with others. it has virtual walks and hikes. it has awards. The things this app does is so much that I am sure to be forgetting some

It's been about 2 weeks now, and bluetooth connection between my phone and Instinct 2 solar has been working. Wasn't an instant fix. For a few days, it would connect for a good part of a day, then disconnect, connect several times morning and night. Just happy the last 2 updates seemed to have resolved the previous issue. Hope others with the same problem see the return to functionality. 7/21/25 update: sync not working again since 7/14 update. Hope it gets resolved soon!

Update 8/18 resolved my complaint with activity tracker exercise editing. 5 stars. Been using for the last 3+ years and like it, until last update (4/24). Everything still works (unlike others I've seen complaining about syncing). But, now, when trying to edit a strength workout, I have to select the exercise, and click back twice to add it. Previously, you just selected the exercise and it added automatically. Not efficient or user friendly since the update.

I'm a mountain biker and with my instinct watch the data and stats I have access too are unbelievable. It also saves me from having to get a computer and mount it on my bars which I wouldn't want to do. The sleep data is also extremely beneficial as well as the data showing how your body has healed from previous training. Being able to look at every ride I have taken allows me to compare stats and see my progression at a specific trail. I have been using this for almost a year and very happy.

Ever since the layout changed, there's errors with updating data manually & it will not allow changes. For example, if I participate in spin, the watch doesn't track the mileage accurately bc I'm stationary. When I go in to adjust the distance to what I did, there is an error & I no longer can. Often lately, the same issue presents for treadmill runs, whereby I cannot update the distance anymore due to the app stating there is an error.

Difficult to use. Scheduling workouts is a pita. If I have a workout I missed I can't go back to it or reschedule it for today. I added my custom workout to the schedule and it doesn't show up on my watch. Garmin watch is Not user friendly at all. Custom workout doesn't show up. Takes so much effort just to do normal tracker things. The charts are ugly, why not look like the watch on app?? At a glance mismatch. Presentation of events is poor. Impossible to setup music Playlists on your watch.

When using this to track a run, it is fantastic but also do strength training. When using it in the course of strength training, I learned that it is just best to record a general strength training session instead of trying to record the details. The gym doesn't always allow you to flow in the order you would build your work out. Right now I am using the Garmin coach to help prepare me for several races.

Have been loving the app until recently when my ability to attach photos (same size, style, etc. as I have been uploaded) has been altered. It allows me to click on the photos tab, but when I click to add photos, there is no option to add them to the activity anymore. The app is up to date

Super annoyed that many of the challenges now have to be purchased through connect+. Very expensive watch and I do not want to subscribe to Garmin's never ending paid subscription for features that have been free until now. Love Garmin watch and the old version of app. BETA version is horrible.. It does NOT allow me to edit what appears on home screen if you delete anything except the 1 required stat. It doesn't allow you to add anything back. I want to choose what is in focus...or not.

Great for keeping stats while biking, and I use the Live Track feature all the time so my wife knows where I am during each ride. She worries because I have Parkinson's. It would be nice to be able to independently label strength training exercises as the default list is pretty limited and I'm not able to label all performed exercises properly.

actually probably the best app I've used so far for fitness. I heard a lot of good thing about Garmin's watches and the app integration has worked perfectly in the two weeks I've had it. I like coaching module, it's free and it's helping me to train for a 5k! I like that it can connect to other apps like Lose It! or My Fitness Pal to keep track of my diet too, although I'm not sure if I'm willing to pay for certain features on those apps yet. I do wish the interface was formatted better.

The Garmin Connect app, paired with my Garmin watch, has truly transformed my daily routine. Its comprehensive statistics have made it simpler for me to track my progress and ultimately achieve my fitness goals. This app is an invaluable tool for athletes, offering free training plans and a wealth of features that have significantly enhanced my training experience.

Great app. Garmin watches are far ahead of the competition. thank you Garmin for listening to us about the app. it is been much improved. One more thing that could be improved would be to be able to edit more with sleep times than the start and stop time. I would like to be able to add an awake time during the night for them the watch doesn't register it.

Over time, they have gradually fixed things, as well as adding nice new features. Unfortunately, more recently, they've made some undesirable changes. The "recent" list in the strength section is no longer alphabetical, making it more difficult to find the exercises you want to record.

Terrible application overall in my opinion. My biggest gripe is it averages your heart rate over 2 minutes. I find this very annoying for accurately tracking my fitness progress. I don't want a smooth line. I want accuracy. I shouldn't need to buy an external hr monitor and app to track my heart rate. I should be able to disable averaging of heart rate at the expense of storage and battery life.

Still hate new app interface from April 2024. It used to be perfect - trash now. I can't choose the focus I want on the main page. Must drill down mult levels and back out for each stat separately. This plus frequent sync issues causes excess battery drain. Manually added data can't be deleted. Sleep tracking is a joke. No choice but to use this app for syncing your device to right time/date. Unless endurance trainer, do not waste your $. Will not buy again unless app reverts to old perfect app

Love my Garmin and the app. Wish they had a full marathon training plan available like they do for the half and 5k! I use it everyday! I would like a more easy to use yoga section that would have sets of positions. It's annoying to add them all after you finish but other than that I love my watch. I don't feel dressed without it! update. I have progressed to running ultramarathons and 50 mile races with the same Garmin watch. Excellent lifespan and durability! I hope to upgrade to the epic 2.

I rely on my Garmin watch to do my 10,000 steps per day. Just a few moments ago I went to sync my watch with the app and it failed. It seems the update screwed a whole bunch of stuff up. Now I can't see any of my steps I've accomplished. How can I delete the update? This is very concerning as a bunch of us rely on this app for accurate info. If the app is not connecting to my watch, what can I do? Please help on this issue. Until it's fixed, it's 1 star!

title: Yandex Navigator
description:
Yandex Navigator helps drivers plot the optimal route to their destination. The app takes traffic jams, accidents, road works, and other road events into account when plotting your route. Yandex Navigator will present you with up to three variants of your journey, starting with the fastest. If your selected journey takes you over toll roads, the app will warn you about this in advance.

Yandex. Navigator uses voice prompts to guide you along your way, and displays your route on your device‚Äôs screen. Additionally, you can always see how many minutes and kilometers you have to go.
You can use your voice to interact with Yandex Navigator so that you don't have to take your hands off the wheel. Just say "Hey, Yandex" and the app will start listening for your commands. For example, "Hey, Yandex, let's go to 1 Lesnaya Street" or "Hey, Yandex, take me to Domodedovo Airport". You can also let Navigator know about road events you encounter (such as "Hey, Yandex, there is an accident in the right lane") or search for locations on the map (by simply saying "Hey, Yandex, Red Square").
Save time by choosing recent destinations from your history. Look through your recent destinations and favorites from any of your devices‚Äîthey are saved in the cloud and available when and where you need them.
Yandex Navigator will guide you to your destinations in Russia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Ukraine, and Turkey.

Yandex Navigator is a navigation app, which doesn't have any functions related to healthcare or medicine.

The app suggests enabling the Yandex search widget for the notification panel.

Yandex Navigator is a navigation app, which doesn't have any functions related to healthcare or medicine.

The app suggests enabling the Yandex search widget for the notification panel.
summary: Yandex Navigator helps you find routes through traffic.
developer: Direct Cursus Computer Systems Trading LLC

scraped_reviews.content: Don't see much difference between this and other Yandex map app. Quite a few roads and addresses are missing, but they have ways to help. They're being polite and trying to help. Updating to 4 stars since they're trying their best to help me add things to the map. It's not perfect, but it's honest work. Had to delete a bit of the review to fit this in, but edit history is on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback ‚ù§Ô∏è Please send us a screenshot showing the absence of roads and addresses. To write to us, open the app ‚Üí menu or profile icon üë§ ‚Üí Contact us or email us at maps@support.yandex.ru. This way we can quickly understand what the problem is.

scraped_reviews.content: ŸäŸàÿ¨ÿØ ŸÖÿ¥ŸÉŸÑÿ© For example, when searching for a place by typing in the direction of Cairo University, you are surprised that Cairo University does not appear, and you press the search button, which takes you to another place. If you use voice search, the results are completely wrong. I cannot find any correct place, as the program does not perform search results correctly, and all the places are unknown and not present on the program, and thus the direction me..ŸÑŸÇÿØ ÿßÿ±ÿ≥ŸÑÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπÿØŸäÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ±ŸäÿØ ÿßŸÑÿßŸÑŸÉÿ™ÿ±ŸàŸÜŸä
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Unfortunately, not all areas and objects are represented on maps in detail yet, but our service is constantly developing, including thanks to the help of our users for whom we create these maps. You can also help us and contribute to the development of Yandex Maps by using our web service Yandex Map Editor.

scraped_reviews.content: The navigation is working perfect.. But the steps added to the application makes it difficult to use while driving. Yes / No approvals, full page ads... And a request: an optional altitude gauge will make sense.. Thanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please specify in which exact situations the "Yes/No" prompts appear that are bothering you. Also, provide a screenshot of the advertisement and send it to us via Menu ‚Üí Support. This will help us resolve the issue more quickly. Thank you for the suggestion to add an altitude gauge. We have noted this idea for future consideration.

scraped_reviews.content: Previously, I gave 5 stars but, now I change it to 2 stars. The reason behind this decision is that It's abnormaly hard to add new places and edit incorrect markers etc. They ask for evidence and they still reject even if you supply the evidence. Quite silly... Again, all the emails and such is in Russian as if we should know Russian... Sadly, I have to cut 3 stars even if the app is great for navigation. Please, make it easier and simpler for map editing functions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Inanc, you can also help us and contribute to the development of Yandex Maps by using our web service Yandex Map Editor, and after passing the moderation and updating the map, your edits will appear on the "Scheme" layer. Join editing!

scraped_reviews.content: In Slovenia it doesn't work good. Outdated map only cca 100Mb for offline work. After googling for specific adress and applying, Yandex didn't found adress. Also freezed for some time mid drive. It knows cities, villages but not adresses. Tested on android carplay standalone device with its own GPS.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To understand everything, we`d appreciate technical information that cannot be share in a review. Please contact us via the app: press menu ‚Üí Support. To help us, please specify: search query, selected scale and format ‚Äî online or offline. Can you please also tell us what type of search are you using: voice, text, or with categories?

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app and I use it when I do Bolt trips and Uber but I've noticed it always sometimes notify me that I've exceeded the maximum limit of open the links, how do fix that admin?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: A restriction has been triggered on switching to Yandex Navigator from another app. This means that the developer of that program has not obtained a special key required to use our application for commercial purposes. Until the app gets such a key, you can build routes directly in Navigator. The restriction will remain in effect for 24 hours.

scraped_reviews.content: The gray color for the fastest route is not convenient , blue or green is more acceptable .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing this idea with us ‚Äî we try to consider users‚Äô requests and ideas when working on updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Why make a navigation app available in a country for which it has no data or addresses? All you can use this app in Greece for, is watch an arrow move about without purpose. You should have stated in the description, the countries you do or do not support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please send us a screenshot showing the absence of places on the map. To contact us, open the application ‚Üí menu or profile icon üë§ ‚Üí Contact us. This way we can quickly understand what the problem is.

scraped_reviews.content: How is this rated 4+ stars??? I've had it for 5 minutes and I'm about to uninstall it. NO TURN BY TURN DIRECTIONS, and that's all I needed to see. Also, the app wants ridiculous permissions that no navigation app needs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Robert, prompts about maneuvers are displayed while driving along the route. To set a route, click on the "Routes" button in the lower left corner, which looks like a curved arrow ‚Üí Specify departure and arrival points ‚Üí select route. You can disable permissions in your device settings: Applications ‚Üí Yandex Navigator ‚Üí Permissions.

scraped_reviews.content: missing navigate to home-work shortcut button on android auto.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So we could look into it, please provide the following: - the make and model of your car - the year of manufacture of your car - the type of connection are you using: wired or wireless - the brand of your media system, if you have a non-genuine head unit.

scraped_reviews.content: It is difficult to evaluate, as it is necessary to subscribe to Yandex Plus, before it can be used in Android Auto, there should be a trial period of say 7 days, to allow the user to fully test the app. Problem is there are many good apps, available at no cost, for example Waze, Google Maps, Here maps etc., Currently I use Waze as my preferred app, which has everything I want, so I have no reason to pay, maybe Yandex offers more, but it is no use if I cannot test the app out in the car.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please write to plus@support.yandex.ru and provide as many details as possible about your comment. We will try to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: The App was great in the past. Last year it somehow started going nuts. In parts of the Moscow Oblast it showed weird routes. Sometimes it did not catch the right location, sometimes the location was way off etc. Furthermore while driving on a main road the Apps suggests that you are on the opposite lane and should turn. To make things worse since yesterday the App is constantly crashing on my S22Ultra. It says either it does not catch a signal and crashes or it crashes anyways.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Andre, please write, under what circumstances does the application crash? Go to ¬´Date and Time¬ª menu in the system settings and enable ¬´Use network time¬ª option. If the geolocation accuracy doesn't improve, try disabling ¬´Google Geolocation¬ª option. Write to us via ¬´Feedback¬ª menu if this method doesn't work. We'll figure it out

scraped_reviews.content: seems like a great app. I've set English as preferred language. but directions are in km. We use Miles in the USA. I will be deleting this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Michael, to change the distance units in the app, go to Settings ‚Üí Map and interface ‚Üí Distance units.

scraped_reviews.content: While driving in certain areas of Azerbaijan, displayed speed limits were incorrect. I tried to submit corrections, but there's no quick or effective way to do so within the app. it would be helpful to have an easier and faster to have an easier and faster way to report or correct speed limit data.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please share the exact coordinates of the point: press and hold the specific spot on the map ‚Üí copy the coordinates at the top of the card and send them to us.

scraped_reviews.content: In previous versions, the app also displayed free alternative routes alongside toll roads. Why isn't it available anymore?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: √ñzhan, you can enable the "Avoid toll roads" option like this: profile icon üë§‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Navigation ‚Üí Avoid toll roads. We would like to note that this option does not work offline. The app does not mark routes that do not pass through toll booths as toll routes.

scraped_reviews.content: This app -in Turkey- forces you to use the most expensive highway. It used to show 3 shortest routes, sorted by time. Now default route is the most expensive one where the second best is the most crowded and longest route. The "reasonable", relatively cheaper and relatively crowded highway is not even an option, and pass points on that highway can't be added manually. Switched to other nav apps for that reason.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please write to us through the "Feedback" menu of the Navigator or app-navigator@support.yandex.ru. Specify what route and between what points you tried to build and show it in the screenshot. This will help us understand the current situation.

scraped_reviews.content: App does not function well. Mine also looks nothing as cool as the one being advertised here. Unable to detect police vehicles, radar detectors etc. Get rid of Ads, Ads, Ads !
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We have noted down your request to add the Radar event to the application. We try to make ads relevant and useful. They should fit organically into the application and not interfere with users. Please show this ad on a screenshot and send it to us via Menu ‚Üí Contact us. This way we can sort everything out faster.

scraped_reviews.content: Awesome. Real time traffic report feels like within 5m of accuracy sometimes. Default language can act weird at times with some menu items stuck in Russian after switching to English. Navigation, route planning and editing and UI & UX in general is a lot better than Google maps though, that's why it deserves 5 stars. Can you add support for custom arrows or at least more options like size and color?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! Unfortunately, the number of symbols in the Play Market is limited and we cannot fully respond to your review here. Please write to us via the "Feedback" menu of the Navigator or at app-navigator@support.yandex.ru.

scraped_reviews.content: For Russia this map maybe is ok, but for UK is worthless, is completely outdated. Not recommended for UK. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Unfortunately, not all areas and objects are represented on maps in detail yet, but our service is constantly developing, including thanks to the help of our users for whom we create these maps. You can also help us and contribute to the development of Yandex Maps by using our web service Yandex Map Editor.

scraped_reviews.content: It announces route's information often quite late when I turned already. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear, Eugeny! Can you contact our support at app-navigator@support.yandex.ru? To analyse the situation, need more information about your smartphone.

scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you taking the time to send us feedback. I will forward your message to our specialists.

scraped_reviews.content: Using every day, and I'm very satisfied. Highly accurate, best with house numbers,.....but. If I set in a car, punch address, app shows directions, start with navigation, but it doesn't know in what direction is my phone looking, mining, I don't know, rather go straight or go back, so always must start driving to see in which direction I am going. 50% chance to make 180 and than go as navi suggests. Maybe app can use compass actively.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Please email us about the situation at app-navigator@support.yandex.ru so we can ask you for more information.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great, all is pretty good except one thing: the app constantly trying to download oflline maps while Wi-Fi AND mobile data both are turned on and device is outside home Wi-Fi (i.e gets Internet connection only via mobile data). Checkbox "Download offline maps via Wi-Fi only" was checked already. Guys, 500 Mb of mobile data is my limit per month, and it was reached by single map update. Not cool.

From planning and traffic points it's the worst app I have used for navigation. The algorithm of routing through traffic is really not great, but that would be the least of the problems, I personally find really awkward that a few hundred meters before the junction the popout window that warns about the turn blocks the view of the junction, making it very hard to tell which turn off you need, specifically in Moscow. Sometimes this popup us partially out of view, goes beyond the screen.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: You can pin hints in the upper left corner: Settings ‚öôÔ∏è ‚Üí Pin hints in the corner. In this case, they will not appear on the route.

scraped_reviews.content: It would be great if you canceled the latest update... And give us back Katie's voice... The application makes many mistakes and sometimes does not complete the sentences... If it continues like this, I'll have to look for an alternative.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It is no longer possible to return the previous version of the application. Please update the application to the latest version. The Navigator already has Kate's voice. Did this help with the problem with voice alerts?

scraped_reviews.content: Very stable. When we started using the navigator in Sudan/Africa it was really awful, But we worked together with yandex team moderators and built the map from scratch. Now every thing is perfect and we are just waiting for the navigator to calculate the traffic jam and the average speed of streets.

title: Google Sheets
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate on spreadsheets from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Sheets app. With Sheets, you can:

- Create new spreadsheets or edit existing files
- Share spreadsheets and collaborate in the same spreadsheet at the same time.
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments
- Format cells, enter or sort data, view charts, insert formulas, use find/replace, and more
- Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type
- Quickly get insights, insert charts, and apply formatting with smart suggestions
- Open, edit, and save Excel files.

Google Sheets is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Sheets features, including:
- Easily add collaborators to projects, see changes as they occur, receive notifications for edits that happen while you‚Äôre away, and chat with colleagues in the same spreadsheet. All changes are automatically saved as you make them. And with offline access, you can create, view, and edit files wherever and whenever
- Get insights fast, powered by Google AI
- Work seamlessly across Sheets and Excel
- Maintain control with enterprise-grade security
- Analyze data from other business-critical tools
- Build custom solutions

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/sheets/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

summary: Create and edit online spreadsheets with Google Sheets, part of Google Workspace

scraped_reviews.content: Useful app for tracking business expenses. this app has a lot of tricks and features that I have yet to discover. I use it on my pixel 9 Pro with no trouble at all, but on my OnePlus 11 it refused to open just the one spreadsheet that I actually needed (but opened others just fine) until I deleted the app, rebooted and reinstalled. that was needlessly frustrating. Docs works great on the OP11 so I don't understand.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi James. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: It updated and now when I click on a cell it yanks the whole sheet down so that row is at the top. It's very annoying because there're other cells I'm trying to look at while typing that now I can't. The formatting panel also keeps getting yanked back to the top at the same time, making it difficult to format numbers or do conditional formatting.

Google sheets on desktop is one of the best applications ever created. Google sheets on mobile is as useless as physically using paper and pencil to write something down, only to take a picture of it to save on your phone. Over the years, Google has relentlessly locked me out of editing my own spreadsheets, leaving me with view only access. It doesn't matter how many times you report the problem to them, because they're not going to fix it.

It has a terrible user interface (e.g., you can't cancel an edit), is riddled with bugs (copy and paste doesn't even work properly) and is short on functionality. However, it has no trouble connecting to its servers and has never corrupted or locked me out of a spreadsheet. Excel can't get either of those things right. Still, I'm seriously considering switching back to Excel.

The app is usable for basic data entry only. I was attempting to work on a sheet away from my computer, since i had the time, and most of the features are not usable in the mobile app, such as editing dropdowns. I am able to create new ones, but not modify existing, also i am unable to change the colors of certain drop down values. 30 minutes of googling to eventually find that it is known not to work very well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tyler. Thanks for sharing your valuable feedback. We'll pass this along to our team. Appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: Look, I get that a mobile app's gonna have less usability compared to the desktop version, but there's two things that really bug me. On desktop, there's this neat trick where you'd use Alt+Enter to create a line break in a cell. On mobile however, the only way you're gonna do that is through copypasting, and even then, only in a very specific way. The app also only lets you select SOME of a sheet's custom colors, so you gotta copypaste cells that contain the color you're looking for.

The new offline functionality is really great, but what's still missing (and still prompts me to use the browser version) is external keyboard support. When I hit the tab key or one of the arrow keys, it should move to the next cell (or down, up, whatever, if I press an arrow key). Instead pressing tab or arrowing right moves the cursor to the menu. This makes it so the app isn't really all that useful for entering data unless I want to enter just one or two cells worth.

I am constantly locked out (View Only) of my own spreadsheet. I am the "Owner" and the only one who edits the spreadsheet, but several people have view only access (via a link) to track information in near real time. It seems about 70% of the time when I try to edit the doc on my phone I can't because it's view only. I've cleared cache, uninstalled and reinstalled the app, logged in using a browser, used a shortcut, used drive... Nothing works! It's absolutely infuriating and unreliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kelly. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: The ridiculousness continues: Now, since my storage is full, and I still have a little less a month to buy more storage, they've removed my ability to edit my sheets?? Stating, "Storage is full. No edits can be made to this file. Delete files for more space." Choices are, "cleanup space", or, "get more storage"... with, "get more storage" being highlighted. WTH? Used to be, I couldn't send or receive emails, which... okay...hold my email hostage for payment. As of 2 days ago, no editing? üëéüëéüëé
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Christopher. We suggest you clear apps cache on your device: Settings - Apps - Sheets - Storage & cache - Clear cache. If that doesn't help, you may post your query in the Docs Community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: If Google Sheets was not free, it would deserve four stars; but being as feature-rich as it is, AND it's free? It's pretty amazing. It's remarkably similar to Excel, which is great. It's compatible with Excel, which is also great. It automatically saves, which is more great. And it's free. It's simple to use, and has a professional look and feel to it. And the integration with other Google Apps and Extensions is very cool. Only real complaint: Chart options really suck on the mobile app.

Generally the idea for the app is great. But it continues to put me, the owner, in view only mode. Often it's just suddenly while I've been working in them. I close all open apps, clear the cache, log in and out of my Gmail, switch between accounts, change to restricted access, nothing works. It's just something that I either have to reinstall to get it to work or just wait for however long, sometimes multiple days. So the function of having an app is almost pointless, unfortunately.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kendra. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Almost unusable. I need to dig into my phone's settings and delete the app data frequently. The ONLY thing I use this for is tracking my workout at the gym, and it can't even manage light use of a basic spreadsheet without getting forced into "view only mode" and requiring a reset. It can even happen in the middle of using it. The fact this is still happening in 2023 is frankly astounding. This is on a phone that just released this year. I'm going to try Excel instead, Google clearly won't fix.

The android/chromebook app is missing the PC menu. Without this menu nearly ALL options are difficult to find, and some are outright impossible! For example, there is no way to set a custom date format (I prefer mm/dd/yy for all dates, and leading zeros are an absolute requirement!). Support is impossible to access, and the Help is less than useful.

Please, for the love of all that is good, FIX the permission removing glitch!! It's happening almost twice a day now. And the fact that someone in my group was able to tell me the fix for it immediately tells me it's obviously affecting a lot of people. If someone who's reading this had a file switch to read only, find this app in settings and delete the data (yes data, cache won't do it) and reopen the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ivy. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love this, use it for personal and self employed business. This is a basic spreadsheet function. Please fix this!

scraped_reviews.content: It seems good overall, but Tables are still an issue. There's plenty of features that the mobile version doesn't have, but I have an idea for a feature Excel has: Cards view. Instead of having to do all this pinching and zooming like a PDF, we could have everything in a row displayed as a page. It's the perfect opportunity to make Google Sheets an actually good competitor to Excel.

Devices - Google Pixel 9 and Pixel 6a. Have had multiple problems with the app this past year. Most often the app switches to "View Only" during use. However, multiple times now I've been presented the message, "Can't sync your changes. Please copy your edits, then revert your changes." which then forces me to select that option if I want to have the ability to open the spreadsheet at all. each time I've done it, I've lost whatever data had been entered the last time using the spreadsheet.

title: Bank of America Mobile Banking
description:
Bank conveniently and securely with the Bank of America¬Æ Mobile Banking app for U.S.-based checking, savings, credit card, loan and investment accounts.

Manage Accounts
‚Ä¢View account balances and review activity
‚Ä¢Activate or replace credit/debit cards
‚Ä¢Set alerts for important account info
‚Ä¢Manage all accounts, including checking, savings, credit cards, loans and investment accounts. 

Transfer Money and Pay Bills 
‚Ä¢Securely send and receive money with Zelle¬Æ using a U.S. mobile number or email address¬π
‚Ä¢Transfer funds between your Bank of America and linked Merrill accounts
‚Ä¢Pay bills

Check Deposit
‚Ä¢Take photos of checks to deposit them to your checking or savings account
‚Ä¢Get immediate confirmation that your check is processing¬≤

Erica, Your Virtual Financial Assistant¬≥
‚Ä¢Ask Erica to find transactions, pay bills and more
‚Ä¢Get valuable alerts, and helpful insights

Security
‚Ä¢Set up Touch ID¬Æ / Face ID¬Æ
‚Ä¢If fraudulent activity is suspected on your card, we‚Äôll notify you
‚Ä¢View security center
‚Ä¢With our Mobile Banking Security Guarantee, you‚Äôre not liable for fraudulent transactions when reported promptly‚Å¥

Manage Investments with Merrill
‚Ä¢Trade stocks, ETFs, mutual funds
‚Ä¢View up-to-date Market data, news, and quotes
‚Ä¢Send messages and documents securely to your advisor

FICO¬Æ Credit Score:
‚Ä¢Easily check your FICO¬Æ credit score
‚Ä¢View the key factors that affect your score
‚Ä¢Find out about keeping credit healthy

Financial Education and Savings & Budgeting Tools:
‚Ä¢Set up and manage savings goals
‚Ä¢Organize and track your spending by category
‚Ä¢View all transactions
‚Ä¢Compare spending against income
‚Ä¢ Easily create a budget based on previous spending or from scratch

See the Online Banking Service Agreement at bankofamerica.com/serviceagreement for more information. Mobile carrier message and data rates may apply.

¬πTo send or receive money with Zelle¬Æ, both parties must have an eligible checking or savings account. Recipients have 14 days to register to receive money or the transfer will be canceled. Dollar and frequency limits apply. 

¬≤Deposits are subject to verification and not available for immediate withdrawal. Other restrictions apply.

¬≥Erica does not provide investment advise. Erica only listens or speaks when you tap the microphone and retains interactions to optimize your experience. Erica speaks aloud and hears and responds to all voices. Erica is only available in English.

‚Å¥You‚Äôre not liable for fraudulent Mobile Banking transactions when you notify the bank within 60 days of the transaction first appearing on your statement and comply with security responsibilities.

Investing involves risk. There is always the potential of losing money when you invest in securities.

Banking products are provided by Bank of America, N.A., and affiliated banks, Members FDIC and wholly-owned subsidiaries of Bank of America Corporation.
