scraped_reviews.content: The biometric login is woefully unreliable. And when I try to use the password, if I accidentally hit a wrong key, I only have a second to notice my mistake. It can lock me out until I set up a new password. (I no longer have steady hands). The way other web sites work, when typing in a password, there is an "eye" icon to the right we can click on that allows us to see the completed password in case we typed any letters incorrectly. I wish you would use that system.

This app would be better if it was easier to find and see my basic info( balance and recent transactions).The T & C should be a link you can click on if you want to see them, & not on every page.It just seems like there's a lot of information on every page, most of it I don't need. I can't speak for everyone, but for me, I like my mobile apps simple and straight to the point. Seeing my balance and transaction history when I log in would be great.

They don't give you the option to do a simple ACH Transfer from one Bank of America account to another inside the app. You have to go to their website to do that and even then it's buried in an easy to miss menu. Instead, they take every opportunity to push you into a wire transfer so they can collect their wire transfer fees. Absolute scam.

I don't review things... and this app is awful. I have about 7 different credit cards for my business, and this one is the worst. Their use of their AI helper "Erica" makes simple tasks much more difficult. If I want to make changes to AutoPay, I need to type out what I want in a text/chat format to Erica and pray to God she does what I want. She doesn't. There is no autopay edit option, and I still can not figure out how to get Erica to change the bank account I use for CC payments. So awful.

This app is generally pretty intuitive. The two worst areas are working through all the links to get to your list of bills that you can pay and the very worst is the new change which took Bank of America credit card payment out of bill pay and made it much more difficult to access and use. They said it was to make things easier for their customers but it did nothing of the sort. It's obviously just something they wanted to do for their own reasons and tried to sell it to the customers as being

This app is so scattered and user-unfriendly that you have to use "Erika" to be able to do anything. Many times I will click in things and end up in a loop...unable to get out of it until I use their version of AI called "Erika". I have missed payments (I have NEVER missed before) because the autopay is not user-friendly. I am considering getting rid of this credit card JUST because of the app!

Easy to use, faster and more convenient than a laptop. Only suggestion would be to be able to save the Security Preference, "No don't remember this device". It should pre-select the "No don't remember this device" choice, if that's what we want, instead of selecting it everytime.

The app could be great if for every action you didnt have to do two more things . For instance. If I need to go to bill pay the option just isn't right there anymore. I have to ask Erica to take me to it, and then it asks for confirmation, so you have to confirm the yes. then it says,Let's go,so you have to click this thing 3 times for every doggone thing. previously,there was a button for it. one action needed to be taken. So why consume our time with tthesextra clicks? I's infuriating!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Gina, Is there something specific with Auto Pay that we can assist with? Let us know- we are here to help! We work hard to provide a 5 star service and app experience and are always open to suggestions on how to better the user experience. Thanks - Ashlyn

scraped_reviews.content: I've banked with BoA for nearly 10 years, and I have not had any issues with em. The app makes it quick to check my current financial standing and all I can say is who doesn't like a shortcut method to see if any surprises hit you out of the blue so they may be addressed as soon as possible? Either way, the app is easy to navigate and any terms of use updates are made available for any user, no tricks or distractions

credit card was compromised. received notification via text at the time. I was able to stop any more transactions from happening. next day I had another text asking me to evaluate the different charges and accept or reject. which I did. the process was four quick steps, my request for a new card was automated as part of this. there was an explanation of what to expect next. just the way this kind of thing should be handled. IT staff-Page by Page transition could use work.some hiccups

Worst bank app I've ever used. Seems like the app is still in 2005. The worst part is the auto pay is completely out of whack. The payment I had set up was for minimum payment plus a few extra. I cancelled the few extra to just pay the small balance, but when I cancelled the extra payment it cancelled the whole minimum payment. Why would BoA think I want to cancel my whole payment and make my account go past due? why would they think that is ideal? Then I adjusted the amount and same issue. Nope

AVOID BOA CREDIT CARDS. Why can't I AUTOMATICALLY pay my credit card to avoid any fees? Chase is so much easier in this area. I've called. "set it up" on my computer. Made sure it was correct and I've still been falsely charged (that what the customer service rep confirmed) and it's still not functioning as it should. I just charged AGAIN. VERY frustrating.

The worst bank app. Navigating around the app is difficult. I was looking for how to pay my credit card balance under my credit card account but the option is not there. You have to use bill pay under checking account. On top of that, you can't pay your credit card balance from another bank on this app via ACH with no fee. It will allow you to do so via wire with a $30 fee. You can pay via ACH from a browser, however.

The app works great for checking balances and transactions on checking and savings accounts. It's also great for bill payments, although they could simplify the transaction numbers and make them bigger on printing. Where the app falls short is on CD's, you can't see interest transactions, opening date, or the maturity date. All you can see are the balances and the term. To see that information, I have to log in to my computer.

I am a senior citizen. I have a disability and I shake badly. I now have trouble signing in because I used to be able to see the digits above the line, so I was sure I hit the right digit. Now, it is just a flash. I also find it annoying that the blue box is not light blue while waiting for the text. Sometimes, it takes more than 10 minutes to receive the text, so it is easier to monitor with it light blue until the text is received.

Today is Saturday, July 5th. I needed to check on a pending transaction on my credit card. When I logged in to the app, I landed on a page that seemed to keep me there until I paid my 2 credit cards. Although I could look at my statements, I could not get to pending or recent transactions. I thrashed around using the menu and other links until I finally found something to get back to the usual landing page, where I could go look at my pending transactions. It is not a good feeling to be trapped.

IT SUUUUUCKS! I've been with BoA for a couple of years now and I was expecting better for a big bank. The mobile app is so bad, trying to find a basic task like schedule autopay for your credit card is so painful, and when you finally find it, you cannot set fixed amount. The website is not better. Things are not organized in main dashboard as they could.

The app always works the way it's supposed to. It's easy to navigate. I do think there needs to be some type of an improvement related to the cash back rewards program and needing to use the links for shopping. there have been several times that I've used links through the app for shopping but didn't get the cash back. something seems broken there.

Once you get charged a monthly fee for not reaching specific criteria, you basically get subscribed to the fee unless you reach out to tell someone to stop it. Super annoying that I have to constantly reach out to make sure that the fees aren't wrongly charged and it seems like the Customer Support will reimburse it but it doesn't seem like anyone is trying to fix it. What a horrible banking service.

this is the worst credit card app. function wise I mean. it's hard to follow/stay on track. things take too long. the payment/pending payment is REALLY WHAT I HATE THE MOST. You guys should take a run through American Express app. now that's where it's at. you guys could really make some improvements. please don't get mad and close my accounts, I'm just saying that your app could use some work. it's simply not that user friendly. I've over paid my credit card bill several times because of it

I can't compare this to other banking apps as I only have one banking account (besides credit cards), but this app does everything I need and more. It's a breeze to transfer fund between accounts.It has a LOT of notifications which I find extremely useful. Edit as of 7/2/25 when I try to set up a notification of a charge over an amount, it will type seemingly random numbers then crashes.And notification that I have to enter an amount does this.

I like the ease of seeing your transactions throughout your day. since we have no BOA in our town we use the app exclusively the majority of the time. I've not encountered a problem yet! Keep it up BOA! Update 7/21/2025, today the app would not accept a deposit no matter what I did. I live 60 miles from the nearest branch and can't deposit. I might deposit in my account at another bank. Pretty frustrating!

Instant notification as soon as charge or credit has been made. Several alerts that you can custom set up to stay on top of any and all transactions. Daily notification of balance. Several additional cash back offers during the month. Warnings when payment is due. Easy to understand app, and easy to set up notification settings.

the app is ok. there are a few things I would change. I don't like when you make a payment, it does not give you a notification page, or some sort of notice that shows that you have submitted the payment. it could say payment pending, something, it just takes the payment and send you back to the main page.

In whole it's good. But they recently made a change, its not nessesary & redundant. When you try to go to bill pay it pops up a screen called recipients. In order to get to your normal bill pay page you have to scroll to the bottom and tap it again. There was no reason for this addition. It doesn't seem to have done damage to the app itself, but why add something that's not needed? I have sent them a message about this twice & have gotten no replies. Lowered rating 1 for change 2 for no reply.

As a customer I've had to have the app for years with varying levels of satisfaction. Randomly changing UI seriously detracts from the usability of the app. Currently having issues trying to dispute a duplicate charge. the app prompted for my review, I said yes it's a duplicate, but it opens as a new dispute without carrying over why it's being disputed. one charge is authorized, the second is not, but it forces me to put a dollar amount other than what was charged.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kama, thanks for your honest feedback! We will share your comments with our design team so we can keep them top of mind as we develop new app updates.For the best app experience, please update the app to the most up-to-date version, 22.07.04. Thanks -Ashlyn

scraped_reviews.content: This app is very hard to navigate. it feels like you have to jump through so many non-essential hoops just to make a payment. You are not able to immediately see that your payment has posted to your account. The only way I knew it went through is that when I tried to make another payment (because I didn't think it had gone through) it asked me if I wanted to make another payment today. There is just so much unnecessary information as they try to push more product on you.

By far the WORST banking app I've used (out of the 9 I use on a regular basis). Set up paperless billing from the get-go, but then never received a statement, and couldn't set up a payment account via the mobile app (had to be in a web browser). Just discovered you can't even make a custom payment amount through the mobile app - only the statement balance or the minimum amount due. What a joke! Why even have a mobile app???

I find it ridiculous how you still can't set up notifications for ANY debit card transaction. It has to be a minimum of $50 or $100. An institution this big and the fees they charge should at least have an option that's so simple, but very useful. It's been over decade and the features of this app are virtually the same, yet it gets even harder to access your account over the phone. Ridiculous

I'm not sure what's going on with this app, but I can't log in. It's always saying, "We're sorry, but we're unable to complete your request. Please try again later." This happens every time I try to log in now! I have to reboot my phone(sometimes more than once) just to be able to log into the App! This started about 2 weeks ago. I've tried uninstalling the app and then downloading it again, but Nope, It doesn't let me log in until I reboot my phone. I'm just over it!! Please do something!

This app's user interface is incredibly frustrating. Simple tasks require far too many taps and feel unnecessarily cumbersome. The amount of friction in navigating and completing basic actions (especially paying a credit card) is surprising for an app from such a large bank. It honestly feels like it was designed by a team with limited experience in UX/UI principles. I hate when I have to use it.

Terrible people, awful company, truly ruthless. Was a relatively short term customer maybe 3/4 years, used their no interest card to save on interest payments several times which worked great. Got sucked into an add on FB talking about debt consolidation for veterans, and because I inquired, BofA decided I wasnt going to pay any more without any communication what so ever, cancelled my account w no warning, I've never been late, never paid a minimum, never missed a payment..never again.

Every single time I go on Zelle on the app it forgets my password. Has happened 5 times in a row now. I have to constantly change my password and then next time I log in it says it's incorrect then have to change it again. Then I put the one I previously had the says it can't repeat a password. And every time I press "Save Password" and it hasn't done that once yet. Maybe the most frustrated I've been with an app in years

Useful to keep track of my banking activity. Love biometrics login. Wish I could use a 2FA app like Google Authenticator instead of getting a text. Brought it down to 1 Star because the last few updates have caused the to keep crashing. I'm running Android version 15 and it keeps telling me to put the app into deep showing nice, essentially disabling it but if I do that i won't get notified when my debit card is used so that's no good and defeats having it in 1st place! Pls fix this!

Super user friendly! Each area of app, whether account info, payments made & pending, and important messages are easy to navigate, won't be missed. Random credit increases according to ones credit & payment history. BOA also offers long time customers interest free specials for a period of one year to 18 months. I recommend this credit card! üôåüèª

I would like to know if there's reason why I get notifications so late. Is it an app issue or the bank itself? I checked once again the set up to make sure everything is checked on, and everything is the same. I have this problem with push notications as well as texts. The weekends it gets even worse. I dont care for notifications on my cell, but having them for banking is a necessity and BofA isn't doing a great job like my credit cards apps

overall a pretty complete app, I didn't explore all options but what I did was straight forward. But it has too many offers of things and services related and unrelated to BoA. This marketing is annoying. also I still prefer the desktop version since it is easier to see everything.

It doesn't take much to leave a review after a great service offered by a great company. I purchased something but the transaction was reversed, but the money went through. I made a claim after calling the merchant and said they didn't receive my money. BOFA helped me get the money back after a couple of weeks later. YOU DESERVE 4 STARS!

They really need to make multiple check deposits easier. We should be able to make one deposit of multiple checks instead of one deposit at a time with this app. Just like when I deposit multiple checks at an atm, it shows up as one deposit on my statement instead of individual deposits. It would make balancing my quickbooks so much easier. Would also speed up the deposit process. I have to finish one deposit before I can add another check. BoA, please fix this.

This App must have been designed by a demented idiot. It is too difficult to navigate; it doesn't give you all the basic information on the opening page (eg, due date); it uses terminology that is different from most bank / credit card Apps (eg, recurring payment vs autopay). Basically the App is a mess with too many layers.

The app provides a myriad of options. Most other banking apps are limited in what you can do, forcing you to go to their web site. Navigation is fairly intuitive also. I'm not happy with the fees BofA charges it's less affluent customers, but the app works very well.

Report with my bank's manager is solid. I only in-person withdrawal, and when I do, he is very good at offering options in a friendly way that doesn't even feel like I'm being offered options; just casual, quick mentions. And he ties it into the conversation to make it make sense for me. Next week we're going over my options, like a second credit card and how to maximize cash back and lump some incentives. This 15 minute appointment will save me money. Thank you, Bank of America.

its a great app but recently they changed Pay your bills doesn't take us to the screen where we had Nick named the bills to our convenience remember it quickly and we could easily recognize it but now we have to match the digits and then open that particular account bill where it displays the nick name - they changed this a few years ago and still didn't put an effort to correct it.

My first paycheck I received I took to the local branch, was told next time I can deposit via phone and it'll be easier and save time. So my next check I take their advice and utilize the mobile banking feature via the app. When this occurred they placed a hold on my payroll check for 8 business days. When asked why so long I was told well next time you can deposit directly at the ATM and maybe they're won't be a hold. I'm just waiting for the hold to be released then I'm closing my account.

so far the Bank of America app is working just fine. update! be careful transferring money from Public brokerage. I transferred $110 from Public to Bank of America and that money just disappeared. I keep track of all my spending and took screenshot and the money just disappeared I never received it and there's nothing I can do about it. so if you transfer money from Public make sure it's not to Bank of America. play will try to convince you that you spend it. even if you didn't.

I am having so many problems with password and i barley get it right thenüò®m something else happens.first it was the codes.i don't get enough help.i always have to call.it all takes to much time. And frustration is to dam much. still very üò∂‚Äçüå´Ô∏èüíôü´£üò¨ disappointed with app too repetitive does not let you talk to an operator very easily and by the time I get through! I'm highly upset so plus I can't keep track of the ü•µü§ß money because they seem to be all over the place for me anyway!

Thank you Bank of America for always putting us first! It has been a great one. No problems and very simple to use! I am very pleased with the app. I really love the New layout. Still the best app for banking yet in 2025!!! Love it!!!!‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§ a bank that is honest with its people who come to them and trust them. I really love that the app doesn't have problems with it as other banks do.

The app works well, easy to use, very functional. Banking with BOA for over 25 years. Poor savings acct interest rates, not good at answering phones in local offices or offering 0% Apr periods on credit cards to boost use, especially when someone has a great credit rating. no added value unless you're wealthy.

The notifications on the app are beyond delayed... whether they are push notifications or emails... they don't come through until a day later for emails and 4+ hours later for push notifications on transactions. These need to be instant upon a charge to avoid any fraud or low balances in time.

You need to improve your app. I don't know how the iPhone version is, but the Android S25 Ultra is awful, constantly crashing and asking me to close the app or wait. Please, team, let's improve this. We have many tools now to make this easier. The app is old and has few improvements; the design is obsolete. I hope you improve it. I'll come back here to improve my review; I'm really upset. For example, two attempts with Zelle resulted in "close the app" and I have to log in all over again.

title: BHIM Bharat's Own Payments App
description:
BHIM (Bharat Interface for Money) is Bharat Ka Apna Payments App‚Äîa UPI payment app developed by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI). Designed for every Indian, BHIM Payments App makes digital transactions easier, safer, and faster with an intuitive interface and cutting-edge features.
With BHIM Payments App, experience seamless and rewarding payments while enjoying the highest level of security. Built for trust and simplicity, with 12+ Languages, BHIM App ensures that digital payments are accessible to all.
üöÄ Why Choose BHIM Payments App?
‚Ä¢	A Brand-New Experience ‚Äì A refreshed; intuitive UI designed for effortless navigation.
‚Ä¢	Family Mode ‚Äì Manage payments for your family in a click!
‚Ä¢	Spend Insights ‚Äì Now easily manage and monitor your expenses, the dashboard way!
‚Ä¢	UPI Lite for Small Payments ‚Äì Make instant, PIN-less payments of upto ‚Çπ500.
‚Ä¢	RuPay Credit Card on UPI ‚Äì Use your RuPay Credit Card for secure UPI payments.
‚Ä¢	Credit Card on EMI ‚Äì Shop smarter with easy EMI options on UPI payments.
‚Ä¢	UPI Circle ‚Äì Give freedom to your trusted ones, to make payments even without a bank account.
‚Ä¢	Pay Bills Seamlessly ‚Äì Settle electricity, credit card, gas, recharge FASTag and other utility bills effortlessly.
‚Ä¢	Light Mode & Dark Mode ‚Äì Switch to your preferred theme for a comfortable viewing experience.
‚Ä¢	Split Expenses Like a Pro! ‚Äì Going out with friends? BHIM does the math‚Äîsplit bills seamlessly, and everyone pays their share instantly! 
Get Started in Minutes! 
Download BHIM & Register using your mobile number 
Ensure your SIM is linked to your bank account (for dual SIM, select the correct one). 
Have your Debit Card or Aadhaar Card handy to generate your UPI PIN (except for UPI Circle users, who only need a valid SIM).
Visit BHIM UPI Partners to check if your bank is live on BHIM. For more details, visit BHIM Official Website and read the Terms & Conditions before signing up.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm really dissatisfied with this app. First, it doesn't show the keyboard to type the OTP which means we have to rely on the app itself to enter OTP for us. Second, when I tried to deactivate my account permanently, it didn't read the OTP for 'some reasons' and I'm stuck with this app. Also the AI of this app is too unhelpful, but that doesn't matter much. Now I am even unable to delete my bank account details. HELP!

The app is so fabulous. I love this app! I‚Äôve been using a few things after changing phones and reinstalling this app. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it‚Äôs syncing because it‚Äôd really stop responding until it‚Äôs done. After activating it, you get bombarded by ads again. This is a good app way too much many times, and even if a user logs in from another device, the data is synced. Thanks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We‚Äôre glad our service met your expectations and appreciate your kind words.
Warm regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: I believe a recalibration is in order for the new Android 16 update. Was working fine, but as soon as the OS update was complete, it was not working at all So, did a factory reset on my phone. However, this time, the app won't keep open. It's crashing at the login screen when entering the phone number, and directing towards the help URL. Even if I do not enter anything to see if the OTP request is triggering such issues, it seems the crashing is happening even when in idle mode.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, we regret the inconvenience caused. You can share your feedback at https://www.bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch or call on our customer care number 1800-120-1740.
Warm regards,
Team BHIM.

scraped_reviews.content: The only UPI app I use and trust. If there's some feedback to be given, I'd say it takes a lot of time to open. And what's with the 2 times authentication? One when you open the app(like, okay ....I understand but it's still unnecessary. If there's an option to turn it off, I would). The other one while you're making payments, checking balance,etc(This one's necessary and valid).
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We value both your appreciation and your suggestion. Your feedback has been recorded for our review. You can also reach us with further details at https://www.bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch or on 1800-120-1740.
Warm regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: One of the worst UPI apps. It's so tough to get onboarded unlike other UPI apps. No keyboard to type in the otp manually, disabling wifi and showing false messages like your device is rooted, etc. Just to name a few. In the name of security they have killed the overall user experience. Despite so many negative reviews and concerns from others, seems like all their feedback and reviews went unheard. Go with other alternatives like Gpay, Phonepe even Cred.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are available to help you. Kindly provide your information through https://bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch, including your mobile number, device model, and operating system version, so that we can address the issue swiftly.
Best regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: After 25.oct.25. bhim app is very very slow, balance not seen, suddenly come out close the application. Very difficult for the past few days, still today not working. suddenly closes the screen, no sound after payment. dead slow in functioning, no balance checks, after pin entered the screen closes suddenly, whether the payment done or denied not known. please kindly check it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for rating the BHIM App! We would love to hear more from you on what you liked about the app and if we can better it in any way. We appreciate the feedback, always. Do let your friends and family know that they can try the app too! :) Warm Regards, Team BHIM.

scraped_reviews.content: I am editing my post. now it's 4 days. when they replied my review I submitted them my all the information they asked for they I didn't get any reply aur action from them. it's still in process. it's been almost 2 days and my transaction is still pending. they asked for a registered mobile number and transaction ID via Gmail. I provided them but still haven't received any calls from them. it's frustrating. Why are they so ignorant?
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are available to help you. Kindly provide your information through https://bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch, including your mobile number, device model, and operating system version, so that we can address the issue swiftly.
Best regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: Thanks for removing the restriction with the developer option. once while standing in a fuel station queue, I noticed this app keeps crashing upon opening, and finally I figured out that it's just because the developer option was turned on. Such restrictions are a real pain for people who work with android development.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
It‚Äôs wonderful to hear your positive experience with BHIM. We value your appreciation and continued support.
Warm regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a developer so I have to keep USB debugging enabled. Now the new update won't let me use it without disabling USB debugging. edit: at least USB debugging is now allowed :) the only issue I have now is I can't disable or top up UPI lite. It is asking me to disable it using my old phone but I used this phone only to activate UPI lite. I tried contacting support via email but the issue was not resolved.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We would like to understand your concern better and resolve it at the earliest. Kindly provide your details at https://bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch along with your mobile number, device model, and OS version.
Warm regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: This app is the most horrible app i have ever used. My mobile recharge got pending and didn't get processed for 3 days and customer service is the worst no genuine answer , they just keep increasing waiting time . The only way you can get in contact with customer service is through email which they rarely reply to . i am going to lodge a complaint in RBI about this

I have gotten used to this app and have stopped using Google Pay. It works perfectly, and I have no complaints so far, except for one issue related to personalization: the app icon does not support Google's Material Theme, which makes it bit odd among the other themed icons in my app drawer. Therefore, I request that the developer add support for this feature.

The app is very slow for making payments , firstly while opening the app it shows the app name for a while then after entering the app pin it takes another while and after that when finally UPI pin is entered it takes another while so making a payment takes almost 2 -5 minutes, it should be made more instant like other apps atleast if not better than others.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are available to help you. Kindly provide your information through https://bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch, including your mobile number, device model, and operating system version, so that we can address the issue swiftly.
Best regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: Update: 5th November, after an update the app works fine now. Old: I was happy with the application until the 1st October update. After which my app stopped working. It now redirects to a webpage and asks to disable usb debugging. If you have any concerns regarding it, show a warning to the user and get their consent. Simply blocking the app doesn't solve your security concerns. My profession requires me to have developer options enabled with usb debugging turned on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are available to help you. Kindly provide your information through https://bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch, including your mobile number, device model, and operating system version, so that we can address the issue swiftly.
Best regards,
Team BHIM

scraped_reviews.content: Since 18Oct,2025 my app is demanding "Touch ID" to open. No keypad option for PIN. I'm locked out. I didn't set it up. My phone doesn't even have fingerprint scanner. There's no specific option to address it through automated helpline. I've tried to take it up through NPCI Twitter handle. They assured in DMs that someone will contact within 2-3 business days, but no response yet. Been using this app for 8yrs. Will likely switch if no resolution soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for rating the BHIM App! We would love to hear more from you on what you liked about the app and if we can better it in any way. We appreciate the feedback, always. Do let your friends and family know that they can try the app too! :) Warm Regards, Team BHIM.

scraped_reviews.content: I can't login to the aaps how silly the developers are when I add my phone no. then suddenly one pops up coming and I cancel it and then I'm entering the opt the keyboard is not coming and again I'm allowed the pop up to auto fill the opt but some error is coming to bad experience I'm strongly don't recommend this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We are available to help you. Kindly provide your information through https://bhimupi.org.in/get-in-touch, including your mobile number, device model, and operating system version, so that we can address the issue swiftly.
Best regards,

title: Video Editor & Maker - InShot
description: InShot - Powerful all-in-one Video Editor and Video Maker with professional features. Add music, text, transition effects for videos, make smooth slow motion, make video collage, blur background and etc! As an easy-to-use editing app, InShot makes creating vlogs a breeze and helps you to become an influencer on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, etc. InShot is also a photo editor and collage maker. Edit pictures and selfie, remove bg, add filters, adjust HSL, etc. Make stylish Instagram story covers and posts. Features: AI Tool - AI Body Effects. Experience the magic of AI with instant presets that elevate your images and videos in just one tap. - Auto Captions. AI-powered speech-to-text tool helps you say goodbye to manual text typing and makes video editing effortless. - Auto Remove Background. Remove background of videos/photos at the touch of a button. - Smart tracking. Make stickers/text move seamlessly in sync with your tracking object motion, adding dynamic flair to your videos. - Smooth slow-mo. Experience seamless slow-motion effects for buttery smooth videos. Full-featured Video Editing - Trim/Merge clips. Combine and compress video without losing quality. - Reverse videos. - Add text, emoji and InShot exclusive stickers. - Add music, sound effects & voice-overs. - Add various-styles voice effects. - Adjust ratio. Fit your video and photo in any aspect ratio. - Speed control. Speed up/slow down video. Add speed ramping. - Keyframes editing. Add custome keyframe animations. - Chromakey. Easily edit green screen video. - Picture-in-Picture. Create multi-layered videos. - Mixtures. Blend your video with blend mode. - Color picker. Pick any color on the screen and apply it to the background/text. Filters, Effects & Transitions - Lots of cinematic filters. - Adjust video brightness, contrast, saturation, etc. Customized video filters and video effects. - Unique effects such as Glitch, Fade, Noise, Beats, Weather, Retro DV, celebrate, etc. - AI effects. Clone, stroke, auto-blur, etc. - Pro editing app with super transitions. Combine two clips with transition effects. Photo Editor & Collage Maker * Blur the background easily. * 1000+ stickers, funny memes, texts & backgrounds. * Turn blurry photos into HD with AI Photo Enhancer. * Remove unwanted objects effortlessly‚Äîchoose between advanced AI or quick manual tools. * Easy-to-use photo grid collage maker. 100+ highly editable collage layouts available. * Pic Stitch. Horizontal, vertical, or automatically recognize subtitles. Canvas & Background - Choose from various background patterns or upload your own pictures. - Adjust video ratios for Instagram/TikTok/Youtube post. Easy to Share - Custom video export resolution, HD pro video editor support 4K 60fps export. - Share your daily life on social media: Instagram Reels, TikTok, Whatsapp Status, YouTube Shorts, etc. InShot is an editing app for videos and photos. With InShot - video maker with music, you can easily make basic video and even advanced assets like video collage, smooth slow motion, stop motion, reverse video and more. Share your vlogs to social media to get more likes, or edit video with music and pic for TikTok. Any questions for InShot (FREE slow motion video editor with music & photo slideshow maker)? Please contact us at inshot.android@inshot.com For more new feature tutorials and advanced video editing tips, please subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@InShotApp Disclaimer: InShot is not affiliated, associated, sponsored, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter.

summary: AI video editor with music! Edit video with effects, slideshow & slow motion

scraped_reviews.content: I've always used InShot, and for most features, it's great. You can get rid of the watermark by watching an ad, and you can do a lot with clips and photos. The one thing that's caused me to begin searching for a replacement is the fact that your clips must be 1.1 seconds long or longer in order to be able to add transitions to them. I can't choose to just have a quicker transition, and if I'm trying to match the clips of my video to the beats of a song, I can't do that with any transition.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback. We will consider improve this feature in future updates. If you have any questions, please contact us at inshot.android@inshot.com

scraped_reviews.content: Well, in the first 10 minutes I was able to add a decent music track, trim it, and add some voice over without needing to read 30 pages of instructions or spend 10 minutes watching some guy on YouTube showing me how to use it. Overall, a snappy and intuitive app that just works for my basic needs. I'm sure it has additional functionality that I'll discover over time.

Oh my goodness!!! I used another editing app that i totally shouldn't name (Cap Cut) and it just wouldn't let me do the most simple things without paying near $20 a month. Although i paid for special things on this app, it wasn't anywhere near $175 dollars for a year like the other one. I love InShot VERY much!!! I was able to get my school assignment done within 15 minutes with no troubles at all. Totally keeping this one

Upgraded to pro version, after seeing how much the app has evolved over the years. I can do literally anything I can think of. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is the fact that the choices you have to add music, even with the pro subscription, are a letdown. There are probably like 30-40 songs in the library, and that's it. And they are not even good. It's a let down, you have to import music from other sources.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks so much for your support. We will develop the features you suggested and add it in the later version:)

scraped_reviews.content: VERY NICE!! love the stickers and how easy it is to use, love how you can cut it very easily,and you can make collages. but one problem are the ads I was trying to use it and to get most stickers you have to watch an ad, which isn't that bad, but one time my friend got a 120 second ad for some stickers to put on the video or picture, and can cut out certain parts of the video, other than the ads. this is a great app.

I've been using this since i became an youtuber. This is very cool and the editing is easier and faster because of the "add to all" button. I can easily arrange the durations and the sizes. I also suggest more effects stickers and letters fonts that are for free. I couldn't use the other ones that needed cash that makes my editing little bit difficult. I also suggest for thumbnail edit because i wanted to make the thumbnail more artistic and make the easy title edit. That's all thnx for reading.

I've been using this app for years now and I love it. The only problem it has is that Instagram had an update where the preview of reels is elongated and so the Instagram sized canvas option is not suitable anymore since it's too short for the current preview on insta. Please update this so that the thumbnail is according to the current Insta preview

Genuinely the best free editing app I've used so far. There is a subscription for certain things, but you can also watch an ad to use most things that are exclusive to subscribers. Pretty sure I'm gonna use this app for a while. One small addition would make it even better though. In the voice effects in the audio section, it'd be really nice to be able to adjust the strength of the effects, similar to the "curve" in the speed section. Other than that, it's literally perfect!

It was great till it wasn't. I was almost at the end of my project when I was facing storage issues in Google. Somehow, this led to issues with my phones internal storage, and all my p in p items were then completely deleted from my draft with no recourse to restore them. We are talking days of work just gone in an instant. It is somewhat understandable that the app itself can not hold that much data, but if I had known this would happen, I wouldn't have bothered paying for a subscription.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, sorry for the issue. Please update your InShot to the latest version and try again. If the problem remains, please send the details and the screen recording of the problem to us by clicking Settings - Feedback. We'll check it soon.

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love Inshot. I've drastically reduced my usage of legacy editing applications on my desktop because I can do a lot of the things I need using InShot right on my phone. They're constantly improving and have a ton of features and resources, not to mention their AI powered captions are the most accurate. My only minor complaint is I wish they had more dynamic captions. Overall, I highly recommend it for video creators who want a quick but reliable editing option on the go.

InShot is my all-time favorite app for video editing! Super easy to use, packed with powerful features, and perfect for both beginners and professionals. From trimming clips to adding music, effects, transitions, and text‚Äîeverything is smooth and user-friendly. I‚Äôve been using it for years, and it never disappoints. Highly recommended for anyone who loves creating quality content on the go!

When I first started using Inshot, it took a while to understand how everything worked. Experimenting did the trick. I really love how smooth editing is and the easy layout design. my videos look flawless, and I am always really happy with the final result. There could be improvements to the text customisation, like more font options but otherwise five stars! Thank you, Inshot creators, you've done a stupendous job.

Loving InShot! üòç With many features, it's pretty user-friendly and easy to navigate. üòä But I have a few suggestions to make InShot better üòÅ: - a feature to change pitch of audio clips üéµ - a feature that enables users to add more than four layers - a feature to change the background üè° - a feature that enables users to add audios from the phone's recorder üîä Even without these features, InShot stands out as my favorite video and photo editing app! üòä I just provided some suggestions! üòÄ

All-in-one app that makes most other "advanced" apps obsolete. It takes me 20 seconds to make a youtube thumbnail, while on other apps, it takes a damn minute for them to load properly. 10/10 app, great for all uses. The Canvas option puts this app above any other. The ads are a bit annoying, but I understand that they're the developer's main source of income, so it's alright.

amazing app!! I've been using this for about a year or two on my old phone, and works just as well on my new one. although, I don't like how you have to watch an add before downloading the image. although, tips: if you want the user to watch the ad for downloading their stuff, then maybe make sure to not just... download the image before the ad, yeah? I can just opt out without watching an ad and still get the download. besides that, awesome editing software!

having been using for years, currently using a pixel 9 pro and the app does not work. keeps exporting videos that clearly have bugs because they are all blank and also make my phone freeze. Also it takes over 5 mins and lots of button pressing for the (X) to appear on an ad when trying to remove the watermark, there is no other way past the ad to get back to the video. I emailed them but they did not bother to read my email properly and clearly do not care.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, sorry for the issue. We‚Äôd like to get more information to identify the problem and help resolve it. Please check your email inbox and share more details with us.

scraped_reviews.content: I just made my very first edit and it's actually incredible. There are plenty of free effects and animations which I love and are pretty easy to use . Yes , once I open the app it does lag a lot but the effects and options make the process way more fun and the result is worth the time and patience. I love the free effects and templates a lot but it would be a 5 star if there were more.

This is very cool for photo edits and goes insane for video edits! All in one online editor! but the problem is with fixing beats. that's some what hard to add beats to audio since it doesn't have option of changing of its speed rate, and there's no option to adjust the existing beats(like to shift 0.05s back or forward) and it doesn't have proper representation of beat. it just shows a dot below the point. we can fix better if it is represented as a vertical line

Edit 11/14/2025 - Still having the lag in the video playback when trying to edit videos the app is still unusable..... Since the last update all videos lag and stutter which makes it impossible to edit. I've been a premium member for years and still have an active membership. If however this isn't rectified I'll have to cancel as I've been having to use tiktok due to the stutter.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Sorry for the issue. We‚Äôd like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Do you still have the video draft? Please send your video draft and the screen recording of the problem to us by tapping Settings - Feedback - Draft. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: This was way easier to use than the other apps, and the features are pretty cool. It sucks that you have to pay for a subscription, but that's just how it is. I wanted a video editor that let me upload three videos and sync them to the frame for a dash cam video to send to the police department.

I had this a long time ago and hardly used it, but recently I've been taken by it. It's a-*what can be complicated editing program made a bit simpler, for the everyday woman/man. I worked for Studios and saw the more complicated systems for editing, and this one almost makes those not matter. Still, I'm learning as I go and am very eager and joyfully appreciative of every lesson learned. Thank you for making an affordable yearly subscription. üôÇ

I'm rating this only 2 stars because at first when I edited a video with it.The video turned out amazing but then when today I edited a video let me tell you first that the lenght of the video was 47 seconds but it was not exporting it was stopping at 11‚ÑÖeverytime.So, I cropped the length to 42 seconds but this time the export was stopping at 14%.I tried multiple times but nothing happend. I hope you will look into the problem. Thank You for reading...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry, could you please cut the beginning or the end of the video and try again or choose a lower resolution.It will work. If not, could you please send us the original video at inshot.android@inshot.com if it is convenient? We will fix the bug faster with your support. Thank you very much.

scraped_reviews.content: *Edit* I have had some issues recently with not converting my longer videos. I have plenty of storage memory. This app is excellent for everything from YouTube videos to tik Tok videos. I've used it for years and I've been always very satisfied. I really appreciate that you can remove the inshot logo by just watching a single ad.

I've used Inshot for years and I've absolutely enjoyed it. I recently switched from an iPhone to an Android so I had to get a new license. I guess you could say to use the software. the only thing I'm really sad about is that it appears that the lifetime fee that you could once pay is no longer available. so now I have to pay for licensed use annually. thankfully the annual fee isn't that much so it doesn't break the bank.

pretty good. I use this to make movies. it is basic, but it still is pretty good. I especially like the tool that let's you draw stuff, it's useful for a lot of purposes when your making superhero movies. my only complaint is you can't import audio from audio files, you can only import audio from video files. I'd like it if they fixed that

This is the best editing app I have ever seen, but the problem is that there is an app- in- purchase, means thatI have to buy my favourite stickers only that is the problem otherwise this app is the best in the world. I also have used piscard but that not even work well. also there is not any disturbance of ads. I love this app and I am giving this a 5 Star THANKYOU -Paridhi Rana

Amazingly helpful, especially since the app lets you remove a watermark just by watching a quick ad. Most other similar apps force you to buy, whereas this gives you more options if you only need to edit one or two videos.

Amazing... even though most of the good features aren't available unless you buy the subscription, you'll enjoy the free features! There are many things that still confuse me, the music is just GREAT!! You can edit the music, add beats, make your own music, fade in or out, change the original with AI, all for free! When you click on the music you have added and then you click 'change voice', and click any voices!Although I wish they added more free AI voices, there are only 4.

At first I loved this app, paid and use it mutiple times a day for all my content creation, but lately it has been doing this Annoying buffering on video that is really slowing me down. I have tried clearing caches, cleaning my phone and nothing stops it. Out of all my editing software this is the only one I'm having issues with. Sad as other than that its a great app. do wish it had some better transitions though. Tiktok transitions interrupt any music I added during edit.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Sorry for the issue. We‚Äôd like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Do you still have the video draft? Please send your video draft and the screen recording of the problem to us by tapping Settings - Feedback - Draft. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: I just started to use this app and it is a very simple one to use. I am happy with the results that I get. I am a beginner at this and if I can use it without difficulty, so can you. This app has so many filters and effects and videos to help you find the perfect picture or awesome video. I highly recommend this one. Happy editing and thanks for the wonderful app üòÄ üíû‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

awesome app! has great tools unlike all other apps, even the free version has many things you can use to create either a masterpiece, special scrapbook moments, videos &/or clips, or even documents you may need for work or for a professional or serious matter, this app has everything you need!! Lots of tools that are extremely useful, effective, and creative for whatever you may need!! highly recommend. 100% LEGIT,no extra bs,.! thanks INSHOT ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüòä

It's so much better than Youcut!(although the same persons who made I shot are the same ppl who made youcut...)Also has one of my favorite artistsüé≠Ikson!You can also make your own stickers!But I wish you could add more fonts because you only have a limited amount of fonts:(.Overall it's good because unlike youcut you can doodle on it! Definitely recommend because if you're planning on having a channel this is perfect,just make sure to install Phonto so you have a lot of fonts,<3 the remove bg!

It's a great app. I love it. It only has two problems: 1. It doesn't support GIFs and doesn't even run GIFs that it makes! 2. The uploaded video is strangely much larger than the original! It's as if it's being decompressed and you can't reduce its size without reducing the quality and length of the video! Thank you

it's an nice editing app but some nice features are primium but you can edit very smoothly and nicely it's an very nice app for editing and making video üì∏ and editing photos. in my opinion i suggest this app for editing but some nice features we won't to buy but app have many stickers and trending , old , famous, popular GIF that you can add in your photos and videos we can add music but it's not have Indian music so we want to import it

The app is great and works well. however I can no longer seem to use videos to get rid of the inshot watermark. which is causing problems. please fix it. I am not saying the ads are innapropiate. I am saying they are BUGGED. when I try to watch the ads then exit out to have watermarks removed the whole thing freezes or crashes. and in the end the watermark will still be there. I also tried to contact inshot. My message was blocked and I dont know why.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, sorry for the issue. In-app ads are provided by third-party advertisers and we can't control it. Please send the details and the screen recording and link of the ad to us by clicking Settings - Feedback. We will block the inappropriate ads with your support.

scraped_reviews.content: the main stuff are free. it's high quality. it's user friendly. you can listen to music while making a video. it's not restricted to underage. 10/10. if they change anything to be paid it's instantly lost of respect. but it's free. it'd be good if it had a change of aspect ratio. if there is, it must be hidden.

It is a really good app for Samsung users, and iOS users.I have used it in both the phones.It provide every functions.It is really fun to use it. it functions are much more better if we got in our mind that it app is free.And I really enjoy using it, it help me for learning editing. You can use it.It is totally free if we want many more.The functions so you can go add insured premium. It also work when your internet is not working.I personally use it when my internet doesn't work.ü§©üíØüëåbest app.

I've been using Inshot for YEARS! I couldn't love it more! It's just perfect, smooth, and high quality, I use it for all my content and projects. The only thing that could be better is that once the project is saved, the music tends to come out, not synced.

Best App So Far I've seen, as an Editor in certain situations when I don't have my Laptop, i always use this App, it has all basic features also for some premium features like watermark removing etc, you can watch the ads to remove it. These features aren't available in other apps.

I am so sick of apps you've ALREADY PAID FOR making users give their email addresses to access the pro features. I paid for a lifetime & had access to auto captions before the update. Now, inshot is telling me I can not access this feature unless I sign up and give them my email address. I DO NOT want to give my email address. This is an editing software that I bought and PAID for. It says pro whenever I open the app, too. Still can't access what I paid for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Please click Restore Purchase in the Settings of InShot to sign in with Google using your purchase email and order ID (starting with GPA ). After submission, we will review and assist you in restoring it. If you have any questions, please contact inshot.android@inshot.com

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this for so long like half an year since I became a k-tuber (k-pop youtuber) and it's helping me a lot just the ripped paper transformation looks like it's lagging (sometimes) and I'm not sure if all look like that but the free one does.overall the app is a must not just for beginners but for everyone.

You can literally do everything in this app! You know what, I dare you to tell me one thing you can't do in this app. It's that good. But then, why did I give it a four instead of a 5 star rating? It's cause I'm having trouble with adding the audios *within* the clip. Imagine I made an edit but when I pair it with the song I want on YouTube, it doesn't match at all! And there are simple sounds on this app but I can't find real songs no matter how hard I try. That's the only problem.

(edit: Please make it so that when you change a Text color, the color is saved in color history, i really need itüôè) So far, this is the best video editor I have ever used. At first i thought that this app was just for vertical videos like instagram or tiktok. But nope, you can also edit horizontal videos on it. Almost all features are free, watermark can be removed by watching ads. For export, there are many resolutions, from 480p to 1080p, and it's free.

Used to work quite well but now suddenly it is extremely slow and unusable. I loaded in a 3min clip that I want to cut up, but everytime I move the time line cursor and hit play, it just gives 3 loading dots on my screen. It takes a crazy long time just to load and play a clip, making it unbearable to work with, having to wait 1 min each time just to be able to get an exact placement to split a clip...

InShot is a very convenient app for editing photos and videos! I love it so much! and it's mostly free. we can just watch an ad to remove the watermark too! very nice! it was kinda hard to find good apps for editing videos until I found InShot. if anyone needs an editing tool/app, then u should definitely download InShot! I could actually give it infinite stars! üòÑüòÖ InShot is that good guys! I 100% recommend! we can say that InShot is top tier! üëç

Really good app. I like how we get the option to watch a few ads to remove the watermark and that we can export with full quality for free, while other apps force you to go premium. I think this is a nice balance for people who don't regularly use editing apps and wouldn't wanna buy the subscription. Please keep it this way.

It is a great app! I was looking for an alternative to Cap Cut, as they made basic features paid, and not free now, so it's basically useless for a free editing app. Then I came across this one, and it's really nice. The only change I wish they made, is to be able to see the music as you are editing the videos and pictures, as after that individual photo or video, You want to match it to the beat of the music. You kind of have to guess when that beat will happen, so it makes it difficult.

i have half 2 years experience,this software is amazing, clip cutting is very easy, I like it a lot! And there are a lot of adjustments in it. The feature that opens by watching video ads in them is very good! I am a disabled person and I am fond of video editing, so if you find it suitable, please make the feature free for me because I do not have enough money to buy your subscription! And the feature that removes watermarks after watching videos is very good, the only thing missing is the pip

went from 5 to 3 star. more and more terrible video game demos that you can't close out of. so your stuck in some stupid parking lot game for a very very long time. yeah I could pay for premium I guess.... I don't mind ads in exchange for a service but that is ridiculous. it almost makes it unusable
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, sorry for the issue. In-app ads are provided by third-party advertisers and we can't control it. Please send the details and the screen recording and link of the ad to us by clicking Settings - Feedback. We will block the inappropriate ads with your support.

scraped_reviews.content: I think I like the fact that I was able to remove the watermark be simply just watching ad‚ù£Ô∏è Hope you don't remove this feature. Also, you can work on a feature that allows me edit a video on the app whereby I can increase the clarity, saturation, brightness etc because I searched for it and I didn't see. correct me if I'm mistaken.

title: Peacock TV: Stream TV & Movies
description:
Download Peacock, NBCUniversal‚Äôs streaming service. Peacock has all your favorite culture-defining entertainment, all in one place. 

With Peacock, stream exclusive Originals, new movies from theaters, thousands of TV shows, and current programming from Bravo and NBC. 

Stay up to date with the news and stream all your favorite live sports and events including Sunday Night Football, Premier League, Big Ten Football, NBA games (starting 10/21/25), The Winter Olympics, and so much more. 
 
With PEACOCK PREMIUM, stream the full library of movies, episodes, and seasons ‚Äî plus live sports and events.
‚Ä¢	Stream new movies from theaters, plus full seasons of exclusive premium TV like Yellowstone and The Office: Superfan Episodes. 
‚Ä¢	Exclusive Peacock Originals, including The Paper, Love Island USA, The Traitors, Twisted Metal, The Day of the Jackal, Ted, and more. 
‚Ä¢	Live sports, including Sunday Night Football, Premier League, Big Ten football, and LIVE NBA Games starting 10/21/25. 
‚Ä¢	The streaming home for your Bravo faves, including Below Deck, The Real Housewives, Top Chef, and Vanderpump Rules. 
‚Ä¢	Current-season NBC hits like The Voice, Law & Order, St. Denis Medical, One Chicago, and Saturday Night Live.
‚Ä¢	Peacock Channels ‚Äì playing your favorite entertainment and news. Scroll less and watch more with SNL Vault, Dateline, NBC Sports on Peacock, NBC News NOW, TODAY All Day, and True Crime. 
‚Ä¢	Hit Spanish-language TV shows and news from Telemundo. 
‚Ä¢	Full library of Kids and Family entertainment. 
 
With PEACOCK PREMIUM PLUS, get everything included in Peacock Premium as well as: 
‚Ä¢	Stream Peacock ad-free.* 
‚Ä¢	Stream your local NBC channel, 24/7. 
‚Ä¢	Download available titles to your mobile device and watch later, anywhere. 
*Due to streaming rights, a small amount of programming will still contain ads (Peacock Channels, events, a few shows and movies, and local content). 

With PEACOCK SELECT, you get:
‚Ä¢	Next-day TV from NBC and Bravo.
‚Ä¢	A selection of full seasons (excludes Peacock Originals) and 24/7 streaming channels of TV shows.

Content availability may vary over time.

Please note: Use of the Peacock app is limited to the United States and its territories. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, 5G, LTE and Wi-Fi networks. Data charges may apply.  
If applicable, subscription charges begin after any promotional period of Peacock Premium/Peacock Premium Plus concludes. You will be charged on a recurring basis as described above, minus applied offers plus applicable taxes. Your subscription will auto-renew until you cancel. Cancel at any time by visiting your account in the Peacock App. By subscribing, you agree to the preceding subscription terms and our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy below.
Learn more at www.peacocktv.com
Terms of Use: www.peacocktv.com/terms
Privacy Policy: www.peacocktv.com/privacy
Customer Help: www.peacocktv.com/help
Your Privacy Choices: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo
CA Notice: https://www.peacocktv.com/ca-notice
This app features Nielsen proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

scraped_reviews.content: "Premium" tier of this streaming service comes with ads....making this the economy class of streaming services. Only reason I'm giving two stars is because other paid services have worse content selections, but I would say there's not enough here to make ad free worth it, and 3 sets of ads during a 20 minute show is a bit much. Go elsewhere if you're planning on paying for ad free, if you don‚Äôt mind ads as much, check out the free content on Tubi, freevee, or similar other services available.

App is nearly unresponsive and takes forever to load. Tried to use the website, as it's much, much faster, but can't watch anything because they want you to use the app. Can't even get past the login page without my phone timing out after sitting there for 5 minutes as it tries to load... UPDATE: Nearly 2 months later, no change. Wonderful app...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Please fix your lagging subtitles. üò¢ Its frustrating to pay for a subscription that doesn't work correctly. Sadly, I and others in my household depend on the subtitles. I need both subtitles and sound to focus on what I'm watching. The subtitles lag so badly that when it goes to commercial, I've missed a large chunk of what was said because it cuts off. A small lag is one thing but it's literally like 20-30 seconds behind what is happening on screen. Please fix this! ‚ù§Ô∏è
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We‚Äôd like to hear more about your experience and investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your account details.

scraped_reviews.content: Jumped on for a sale of premium for a year at $19.99. An hour in and decided it isn't worth it. 1.) I'm paying premium and need to watch ads? There are other streamers that are ad free and there are free streamers with plenty of content if I don't care about ads. The regular price of $79.99 is not worth it. I refuse to pay to watch commercials. 2.) Progress isn't saved. So if I need to exit and come back to something later I have to start completely over. Bad interface. I won't be renewing.

Yet again there's a problem with the accessibility features automatically turning on each time I watch anything. Each episode the features go back to being on. This time it's an issue with the audio description feature. It's automatically on when starting an episode and if I'm streaming from my galaxy 24+ to a smart TV or Chromecast I can't even toggle the settings to off anymore. It's not even an option. Im Likely cancelling. Again. I can't even use the app like this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: It's annoying that they make you start your episode over or in a different spot (or even in the previous episode) than where you left off so you have to "fast forward" to get back where you left off, which means you have to watch more adds. Its their way to get you to watch more adds. And it's frustrating. scraped_reviews.content: Your cancel button at the end of a show doesn't work. Never has! I hate that you don't allow us to remove the auto play. I don't want another video played. This app sucks if you're trying to watch things in peace. There are way too many commercial breaks, and they are long ones. The worst part is that it doesn't save your place in the episode so you have to look for it while watching all the commercials again. I end up just starting the next episode so you can't even watch a series correctly. it's beyond frustrating. Netflix only does 30-second ads, and it's once every episode for $7. Definitely keeping netflix and leaving peacock ($12).

Does not matter what device I use (Fire Stick, Tablet, or computer), the app lags, skips and randomly shuts down. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling. I've done all updates. Issue persists. Plus has commercials? Should be a FREE streaming app if its going to have commercials AND have all the issues!! Only getting the second star because I like the shows and movies it offers, just wish I could watch something all the way through without it glitching or shutting down.

terrible: they fast-forward the credits to 30 seconds so no artist gets credit, it's literally part of the movie. go to Facebook and search "Mike McGowan Peacock", you'll see it. Isn't against your license agreement to change/re-edit the film? They add fade-to-blacks during the movie for ads, we pay so there's no ads, but there's still fade-to-blacks! I've seen the move, there's no fade-to-black for any end to a scene, so annoying and out-of-place for any film. Stop it, it's not your IP.

it's the beginning of the end when you can't use your voice (Google, Alexa) to control a streaming app... since, from the beginning of time, their in-app navigation has been useless. I'm sure it's Ad related since the reason you can't use in-app in any of the apps are mostly due to it wanting to play an Ad the second you come close to the slider.

So my family is on Premium, because it comes with Xfinity, and sure, I watch 3 minutes worth of ads just to watch the whole movie afterwards, which personally, I don't mind. But now they are baking promotional ads into the movie every 20 or so minutes that I have to skip past. Not only is this a new low, but it is beyond intrusive for paying customers. I myself will not be using this app again until this stops.

Despite being one of the largest companies as far as NBC goes. streaming service needs some attention. it's always lagging. Please please please fix this lagging problem

don't buy into a Peacock subscription. They LIE and say there are no ads in certain tiers, but it's not true.
